;Episode ends
;***********************************************
*ep1_end
	notif %UMINEKOEND < 11 jumpf
		seplay 1,22,70
		lbg "c:locale_lan",s0_5,"text004"
		flush 22
		wait2 10000
		csp_slot s0_5
		flush 22
	~
	if %UMINEKOEND < 11 mov %UMINEKOEND,11 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,11 : mov %UMINEKOEND_MUSIC_FLG,1 : mov %UMINEKOEND_CG_FLG,1
return

*ep2_end

		flush 22
		if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS < 21 mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,20 ;Animations - unlocks the next episode - prevents reassignment of re-reading ura
	~
	if %UMINEKOEND < 20 mov %UMINEKOEND,20 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,20 : mov %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_FLG,1 : mov %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG,1
return

return

;Our credits
;***********************************************
*credits_base
	border_pad_push 0
	E_A
	gosub *textoff2

	skip_off

#locale_import "credits.txt"

	;stopwatch "credits_render_start"
	lbsp2 s0_5,$Free1,0,0
	;stopwatch "credits_render_end"
	getspsize2 s0_5,%Free1,%Free2
	aspt2 xpos,s0_5,%Free1/2
	aspt2 ypos,s0_5,%Free2/2 + 1200
	print 1

return

*credits_end
	sptwait2 ypos,s0_5
	vol_bgm -1,3000
	wait2 3000
	lsp s0_5,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:20:{a:c:2011-2020, Umineko Project}{n}}",0,990
	print 2
	wait2 6000
	csp_slot s0_5
	print 2
	border_pad_pop
	skip_on
return

*credits_ep4
	gosub *credits_base
	bgmplay 8,100,1
	spt2 ypos,s0_5,-%Free2-1200,94000
	gosub *credits_end
return

*credits_ep8
	gosub *credits_base
	bgmplay 8,100,1
	spt2 ypos,s0_5,-%Free2-1200,95000
	gosub *credits_end
return

*chiru_ending
	ch_done flag_scenario_8_16
return

;Endings
*end_game

;For various credits
csp_slot s0_3
csp_slot s0_4
csp_slot s0_5
csp_slot s0_6
csp_slot s0_7

bg black,0 ;black and white are native

if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 jumpf
if %CHIRU_MODE = 2 jumpf ;Saku - skip end game scenarios - W_CUSTOM

if $name_chapter_save == "1_17" && $flag_scenario_1_17 == "●" trophy_open 22 : trophy_open 2 : trophy_open 3
if $name_chapter_save == "2_18" && $flag_scenario_2_18 == "●" trophy_open 23 : trophy_open 4 : trophy_open 5
if $name_chapter_save == "3_18" && $flag_scenario_3_18 == "●" trophy_open 24 : trophy_open 6 : trophy_open 7
if $name_chapter_save == "4_19" && $flag_scenario_4_19 == "●" trophy_open 25 : trophy_open 8 : trophy_open 9

if $name_chapter_save == "1_tea" && $flag_scenario_1_tea == "●" trophy_open 11
if $name_chapter_save == "2_tea" && $flag_scenario_2_tea == "●" trophy_open 13
if $name_chapter_save == "3_tea" && $flag_scenario_3_tea == "●" trophy_open 15
if $name_chapter_save == "4_tea" && $flag_scenario_4_tea == "●" trophy_open 17

if $name_chapter_save == "1_ura" && $flag_scenario_1_ura == "●" trophy_open 12
if $name_chapter_save == "2_ura" && $flag_scenario_2_ura == "●" trophy_open 14
if $name_chapter_save == "3_ura" && $flag_scenario_3_ura == "●" trophy_open 16
if $name_chapter_save == "4_ura" && $flag_scenario_4_ura == "●" trophy_open 18

if $name_chapter_save == "1_17" gosub *ep1_end
if $name_chapter_save == "2_18" gosub *ep2_end
if $name_chapter_save == "3_18" gosub *ep3_end
if $name_chapter_save == "4_19" gosub *ep4_end

if $name_chapter_save == "1_tea" gosub *teatime_ep1_end
if $name_chapter_save == "2_tea" gosub *teatime_ep2_end
if $name_chapter_save == "3_tea" gosub *teatime_ep3_end
if $name_chapter_save == "4_tea" gosub *teatime_ep4_end

if $name_chapter_save == "1_ura" gosub *teatime_ep1b_end
if $name_chapter_save == "2_ura" gosub *teatime_ep2b_end
if $name_chapter_save == "3_ura" gosub *teatime_ep3b_end
if $name_chapter_save == "4_ura" gosub *teatime_ep4b_end : gosub *credits_ep4

~

if %CHIRU_MODE = 0 jumpf
if %CHIRU_MODE = 2 jumpf ;Saku - skip end game scenarios - W_CUSTOM

;chiru
if $name_chapter_save == "5_15" && $flag_scenario_5_15 == "●" trophy_open 40 : trophy_open 2 : trophy_open 3
if $name_chapter_save == "6_18" && $flag_scenario_6_18 == "●" trophy_open 41 : trophy_open 4 : trophy_open 5
if $name_chapter_save == "7_18" && $flag_scenario_7_18 == "●" trophy_open 42 : trophy_open 6 : trophy_open 7
if $name_chapter_save == "8_16" && $flag_scenario_8_16 == "●" && %chosen_ending == 2 trophy_open 43 ; trick
if $name_chapter_save == "8_16" && $flag_scenario_8_16 == "●" && %chosen_ending == 1 trophy_open 8 ; magic


if $name_chapter_save == "5_tea" && $flag_scenario_5_tea == "●" trophy_open 30
if $name_chapter_save == "6_tea" && $flag_scenario_6_tea == "●" trophy_open 32
if $name_chapter_save == "7_tea" && $flag_scenario_7_tea == "●" trophy_open 34
if $name_chapter_save == "8_tea" && $flag_scenario_8_tea == "●" trophy_open 36

if $name_chapter_save == "5_ura" && $flag_scenario_5_ura == "●" trophy_open 31
if $name_chapter_save == "6_ura" && $flag_scenario_6_ura == "●" trophy_open 33
if $name_chapter_save == "7_ura" && $flag_scenario_7_ura == "●" trophy_open 35 : mov $lbg_name,"portrait_ep7" : gosub *open_cg
;Ending 2
if $name_chapter_save == "8_ura" && $flag_scenario_8_ura == "●" trophy_open 37 : trophy_open 44 : mov $lbg_name,"portrait_ep8" : gosub *open_cg

if $name_chapter_save == "5_15" gosub *ep5_end
if $name_chapter_save == "6_18" gosub *ep6_end
if $name_chapter_save == "7_18" gosub *ep7_end
if $name_chapter_save == "8_16" && %chosen_ending == 1 gosub *ep8_end ; magic

if $name_chapter_save == "5_tea" gosub *teatime_ep5_end
if $name_chapter_save == "6_tea" gosub *teatime_ep6_end
if $name_chapter_save == "7_tea" gosub *teatime_ep7_end
if $name_chapter_save == "8_tea" gosub *teatime_ep8_end

if $name_chapter_save == "5_ura" gosub *teatime_ep5b_end
if $name_chapter_save == "6_ura" gosub *teatime_ep6b_end
if $name_chapter_save == "7_ura" gosub *teatime_ep7b_end
if $name_chapter_save == "8_ura" gosub *teatime_ep8b_end : gosub *credits_ep8
;end

~

goto *quick_reload

;*************************************************
; Omakes
;*************************************************

*o1
bg black,0
log_reset
skip_on
mov %r_mode_flg,1
goto *o1_0

*o2
bg black,0
log_reset
skip_on
mov %r_mode_flg,1
goto *o2_0

*o3
bg black,0
log_reset
skip_on
mov %r_mode_flg,1
;mov %no_cache_atm,on ;disable voice caching
goto *o3_start

*o4
bg black,0
log_reset
skip_on
mov %r_mode_flg,1
;mov %no_cache_atm,on ;disable voice caching
goto *o4_0

*o5
*o6
*o7
*o8
*o_chiru ;Method that changes from and to Chiru
bg black,0
log_reset
skip_on
mov %r_mode_flg,1
goto *o_chiru_start

*o1_end
*o2_end
*o3_end
*o4_end
if %omake_level >= 2 mov $omake_return,"omake"
*o_chiru_end
skip_off
gosub *textoff2
csp -10
flush2 10,5000
fede 0,5000
E_A
mov %r_mode_flg,0
skip_on
goto *quick_reload

mov %title_skip,1
definereset

	numalias end_8a_scaley,200

;----------------------------------------

;Parsing startup default variables
;8010 flag
;8015 - 8013 vol
;8056 - 720p/1080p
;8057 - Enable elephants and 'buffers' (yes, let's enable)
;msgwnd_type (8058) - msgwnd
;8060 - moving lips
;8061 - animated rain

;Original Edited - changed initial config values - W_CUSTOM
if %init_done = 1 jumpf 

	;System
	;Display settings - choosen on startup
	;Renderer - choosen on startup
	;Input Mode - choosen on startup
	mov %cfg_menu_anim,1
	mov %enable_cache,1
	mov %hide_textbox,0

	;Game
	mov %textspeed,7 : mov %textspeed2,7
	mov %automodespeed,-43
	mov %rumble_strength,20
	mov %cfg_chapter_display,0 : mov %cfg_bgm_display,1
	mov %skip_unread,1
	mov %cfg_rm_sex_content_index,0 ;Keep Original

	;Sound
	mov %bgm_vol,50
	mov %sfx_vol,50
	mov %dlg_vol,70 
	;Mute specific characters - no init required
	mov %cfg_lower_music_on_d,0
	mov %animated_lips,1

	;Language
	;Language - choosen on startup
	mov %cfg_voice_language,1 ;Japanese
	mov %bgm_title_language,1 ;English
	mov %op_ed_song_subtitles,2 ;Translation
	mov %cfg_steam_conventions,0 ;TODO actually choose

	;Graphics
	mov %cfg_sprite_type_index,3
	mov %msgwnd_type,0 ;Black
	mov %cfg_bg_type_index,2
	mov %cfg_book_mode,0
	mov %cfg_bg_movement,0


	;Old code for low ram devices, c'mon, what has low ram now-a-days
	getram %Free1 ; default to 720p on low memory devices (like iOS)
	if %Free1 <= 2048 mov %video_res,1
	if %Free1 >  2048 mov %video_res,0
	;mov %animated_rain,1 - never existed
	;mov %bgm_chapter_display,1 - Separated


	for %Free1 = flag_scenario_1_op to flag_scenario_8_ura
		mov $%Free1,"○" ;●
	next

	#locale_import "prefs.txt"

	mov %last_save,-1

	mov %old_wording,1 ;This shouldn't have any use, so better not touch it
	mov %video_res,0
	mov %sskip_turbo,0 ;Foundamental
	mov %init_done,1



~

;Compatibility code for our old users
if %automodespeed = 0 mov %automodespeed,-20

;Compatibility code for our testers
;Unlocks already read chapters
if %did_unlock = 1 jumpf
	gosub *do_unlock
	mov %did_unlock,1
~

return
;End Custom

;*************************************************


;*************************************************
;Initialization for ep1 variable
;*************************************************

*bt_ep1_def

;Type the number in the array, type the path to a variable number of characters
mov %tmp10,2400

for %tmp11 = 1 to char_max
	for %tmp12 = 0 to 5
		mov ?r[1][%tmp11][%tmp12],%tmp10 : inc %tmp10
	next
next

;(Enter a few minutes for each change of state of character), type the path to the array

mov ?r[1][kin][condition_end],3 ;4 so that virtually 0 to 3.
mov $?r[1][kin][0],":a/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_non.png"
mov $?r[1][kin][1],":a/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_kin0.png"

mov ?r[1][ros][itiran_x],330-130-12+2 : mov %tmp,280 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[1][ros][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[1][mar][itiran_x],590-190-36-2 : mov %tmp,280 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[1][mar][itiran_y],454

mov ?r[1][kan][itiran_x],460-160-24 : mov %tmp,368 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[1][kan][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[1][goh][itiran_x],590-190-36-2 : mov %tmp,368 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[1][goh][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[1][kum][itiran_x],720-220-48-4 : mov %tmp,368 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[1][kum][itiran_y],542

mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_x],200-100-0  : mov %tmp,192 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_y],366
mov ?r[1][ber][itiran_x],460-160-24 : mov %tmp,280 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[1][ber][itiran_y],366

*bt_ep2_def

for %tmp11 = 1 to char_max_ep2
	for %tmp12 = 0 to 6
		mov ?r[2][%tmp11][%tmp12],%tmp10 : inc %tmp10
	next
next

mov ?r[8][ma5_en2][itiran_x],224+81+28-%tmp 	 			: mov ?r[8][ma5_en2][itiran_y],278
mov ?r[8][ma5_eri][itiran_x],224+81+28-%tmp+57+(56-%tmp*2)	: mov ?r[8][ma5_eri][itiran_y],278
mov ?r[8][ma5_ev2][itiran_x],224+81+28-%tmp+57*2+(56-%tmp*2)*2	: mov ?r[8][ma5_ev2][itiran_y],278

mov ?r[8][ma5_wal][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-55*2  					: mov ?r[8][ma5_wal][itiran_y],366
mov ?r[8][ma5_ron][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-55  					: mov ?r[8][ma5_ron][itiran_y],366
mov ?r[8][ma5_gap][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp	 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_gap][itiran_y],366
mov ?r[8][ma5_dla][itiran_x],224+81+28-%tmp 	 		: mov ?r[8][ma5_dla][itiran_y],366
mov ?r[8][ma5_ger][itiran_x],224+81+28-%tmp+55					: mov ?r[8][ma5_ger][itiran_y],366
mov ?r[8][ma5_cor][itiran_x],224+81+28-%tmp+55*2 					: mov ?r[8][ma5_cor][itiran_y],366

mov ?r[8][ma5_s00][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-57*2-(56-%tmp*2)*2	: mov ?r[8][ma5_s00][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[8][ma5_s410][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-57*2-(56-%tmp*2)*2+55 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_s410][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[8][ma5_s45][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-57*2-(56-%tmp*2)*2+55*2 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_s45][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[8][ma5_s556][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-57*2-(56-%tmp*2)*2+55*3 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_s556][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[8][ma5_zep][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-57*2-(56-%tmp*2)*2+55*4+7 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_zep][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[8][ma5_fur][itiran_x],224+81-28-57+%tmp-57*2-(56-%tmp*2)*2+55*4+7+55 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_fur][itiran_y],542
mov ?r[8][ma5_GOA][itiran_x],224+81+28-%tmp+57*2+(56-%tmp*2)*2 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_GOA][itiran_y],542

mov ?r[8][ma5_rg][itiran_x],200-100-0+4+8 : mov %tmp,200-100-0+4+6 : add %tmp,55 : mov ?r[8][ma5_rg][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_1][itiran_x],%tmp	: add %tmp,55 : mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_1][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_2][itiran_x],%tmp	: add %tmp,55 : mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_2][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_3][itiran_x],%tmp 	: add %tmp,55 : mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_3][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_4][itiran_x],%tmp 	: add %tmp,55 : mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_4][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_5][itiran_x],%tmp 	: add %tmp,55 : mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_5][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_6][itiran_x],%tmp 	: add %tmp,55 : mov ?r[8][ma5_rg_6][itiran_y],454


;mov ?r[8][ma5_w][itiran_x],17 		: mov ?r[8][ma5_w][itiran_y],%tmp
;mov ?r[8][ma5_s][itiran_x],17 		: mov ?r[8][ma5_s][itiran_y],%tmp
;mov ?r[8][ma5_k][itiran_x],62 		: mov ?r[8][ma5_k][itiran_y],%tmp
;mov ?r[8][ma5_zf][itiran_x],106 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_zf][itiran_y],%tmp

mov ?r[8][ma5_but][itiran_x],1500 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_but][itiran_y],366
mov ?r[8][ma5_bea][itiran_x],1500 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_bea][itiran_y],454
mov ?r[8][ma5_wil][itiran_x],1500 	: mov ?r[8][ma5_wil][itiran_y],542

return

;***************************************************************

;*************************************************
;Initialization for ep8_3 variable
;*************************************************
*bt_ep8_3_def

;配列に数字を入力、数字の文字変数にパスを入力
mov %tmp10,2400

for %tmp11 = 1 to char_max_ep5_2
	for %tmp12 = 0 to 6
		mov ?r[8][%tmp11][%tmp12],%tmp10 : inc %tmp10
	next
next


;配列にパスを入力（キャラごとの状態変化数分入力）

mov ?r[8][ma5_AMA][condition_end],1
mov $?r[8][ma5_AMA][1],":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_AMA_l.png"

mov ?r[8][ma5_FEA][condition_end],1
mov $?r[8][ma5_FEA][1],":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_fea_l.png"
mov $?r[8][ma5_FEA][2],":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_fea_l2.png"

mov ?r[8][ma5_enj][condition_end],1
mov $?r[8][ma5_enj][1],":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_enj_l.png"
mov $?r[8][ma5_enj][2],":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_enj_l.png"

;一覧表示の座標を入力



mov ?r[8][ma5_FEA][itiran_x],62 : mov ?r[8][ma5_FEA][itiran_y],%tmp

mov ?r[8][ma5_enj][itiran_x],106 : mov ?r[8][ma5_enj][itiran_y],%tmp
mov ?r[8][ma5_AMA][itiran_x],106 : mov ?r[8][ma5_AMA][itiran_y],%tmp


return

;---------------------------------------

;*********************************************************
; Right click custom system
; Function by right-clicking the first occurrence of
; June 20, 2007 version created BT
;*********************************************************


;----------------------------------------
;Preliminary menu system before entering the right-click
;r_menu ;r_click ;r_trap
*rmenu_custom     ;Right-click the screen display
	mov %r_for_title,0

	blur 2000

	btndef ""

	;Original Edited ;Text Generator - Remade r-menu - W_CUSTOM
	lsp 451,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0,black_toukaritu ;0
	lsp r_load_lsp,r_menu_btn_1,50,50	
	write_special_text gen_txt_1,"r_menu_btn",50,50+9,"Load"
	lsp r_save_lsp,r_menu_btn_2,50,130	
	write_special_text gen_txt_2,"r_menu_btn",50,130+9,"Save"

	lsp r_chars_lsp,r_menu_btn_3,50,210	
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && $name_chapter_save = "8_op" lsp r_chars_lsp,r_menu_btn_3,50,210,100
	write_special_text gen_txt_3,"r_menu_btn",50,210+9,"Characters"
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && $name_chapter_save = "8_op" aspt alpha,gen_txt_3,100 : aspt alpha,gen_txt_3-20,100 : aspt alpha,gen_txt_3-19,100

	lsp r_tips_lsp2,r_menu_btn_4,50,290	
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %grim_scene = 500 lsp r_tips_lsp2,r_menu_btn_4,50,290,100
	write_special_text gen_txt_4,"r_menu_btn",50,290+9,"Tips"
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %grim_scene = 500 aspt alpha,gen_txt_4,100 : aspt alpha,gen_txt_4-20,100 : aspt alpha,gen_txt_4-19,100
	
	lsp r_volume_lsp,r_menu_btn_5,50,370	
	write_special_text gen_txt_5,"r_menu_btn",50,370+9,"Config"
	lsp r_logs_lsp2,r_menu_btn_6,50,450	
	write_special_text gen_txt_6,"r_menu_btn",50,450+9,"Logs"
	lsp r_clear_lsp,r_menu_btn_7,50,530	
	write_special_text gen_txt_7,"r_menu_btn",50,530+9,"Clear"
	lsp r_system_lsp,r_menu_btn_8,50,610	
	write_special_text gen_txt_8,"r_menu_btn",50,610+9,"Title"
	;End Custom
	
	;lsp name_chapter_r_click,$name_chapter_r_click,0,0 ;Original Edited - substituted with text generation - W_CUSTOM
	;Text Generator - generating chapter name - W_CUSTOM
	lsp gen_txt_10,blank,0,0
	write_special_text gen_txt_10,"ch_name",960,740,$name_chapter_r_click
	;End Custom

	gosub *rmenu_draw_time 
	print 1

	gosub *menu_rain_pause
	
	; Flag abuse to prevent time displaying in "Clear" mode
	if %skip_flg == on skip_off : mov %skip_flg_bak,on

	*rmenu_btlp
		btndef ""
		;Original Edited - from sptbtn to exbtn in order to enable glow with gen text - W_CUSTOM
		exbtn_d "C21-36"
		;save/load
		exbtn r_load_lsp,r_load_lsp,"P35P36"
		exbtn r_save_lsp,r_save_lsp,"P33P34"
		;other
		exbtn r_chars_lsp,r_chars_lsp,"P31P32"
		exbtn r_tips_lsp2,r_tips_lsp2,"P29P30"
		
		;bgm volume	
		exbtn r_volume_lsp,r_volume_lsp,"P27P28"
		
		exbtn r_logs_lsp2,r_logs_lsp2,"P25P26"
		
		exbtn r_clear_lsp,r_clear_lsp,"P23P24"
		exbtn r_system_lsp,r_system_lsp,"P21P22"

	*rmenu_btlp2
		if %skip_flg == off gosub *rmenu_draw_time 
		print 1
		getzxc
		btnasync 1
		btnwait2 %BtnRes

		if %BtnRes = r_clear_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *menu_rain_unpause : gosub *r_exit3 : goto *rmenu_btlp
		if %BtnRes = r_system_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *rmenu_title_back : goto *rmenu_btlp ; We must set up the menu again since rmenu_title_back destroyed it.
		if %BtnRes = r_volume_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *r_image_cleanup : gosub *settings : gosub *menu_rain_unpause : goto *r_exit2
		if %BtnRes = r_save_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *r_image_cleanup : gosub *savemode : gosub *menu_rain_unpause : goto *r_exit2
		if %BtnRes = r_load_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *r_image_cleanup : gosub *loadmode : gosub *menu_rain_unpause : goto *r_exit2
		if %BtnRes = r_chars_lsp && %scenario_Number = 8 && $name_chapter_save = "8_op" seplay 9,32,100 : goto *rmenu_btlp
		if %BtnRes = r_chars_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *r_image_cleanup : mov %r_display,0 : gosub *rmenu_main : goto *r_exit2
		if %BtnRes = r_tips_lsp2 && %scenario_Number = 4 && %grim_scene = 500 seplay 9,32,100 : goto *rmenu_btlp
		if %BtnRes = r_tips_lsp2 && %scenario_Number = 8 seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *r_image_cleanup : mov %r_display,2 : gosub *rmenu_main : goto *r_exit2
		if %BtnRes = r_tips_lsp2 seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *r_image_cleanup : mov %r_display,1 : gosub *rmenu_main : goto *r_exit2
		if %BtnRes = r_logs_lsp2 seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *r_image_cleanup : mov %r_display,3 : gosub *rmenu_lookback : mov %r_display,0 : goto *rmenu_btlp_exit
		; Right click
		if %BtnRes = -1 gosub *menu_rain_unpause : goto *rmenu_btlp_exit
		; Esc key (if useescspc) -- which doesn't seem to be set?
		if %BtnRes = -10 gosub *menu_rain_unpause : goto *rmenu_btlp_exit
		; Z key (if getzxc)
		if %BtnRes = -51 gosub *menu_rain_unpause : goto *rmenu_btlp_exit
		goto *rmenu_btlp2

	*rmenu_btlp_exit
		gosub *r_exit
		return

	*rmenu_draw_time
		border_pad_push 3
		
		mov $ts_session,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:7:" + sess_total_clicks + ": "
		itoa $savecountClick,%savecountClick
		add $ts_session,$savecountClick
		add $ts_session, " " ;Original Edited - needed to prevent the cut on the right part of the text - W_CUSTOM

		gosub *trophy_session_reset
		add $ts_session,"{n}" + sess_total_time + ": "
		itoa $savecountTime,%savecountTime / 3600
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime + ":"
		itoa $savecountTime,%savecountTime mod 3600 / 60
		if %savecountTime mod 3600 < 600 add $ts_session,"0"
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime + ":"
		itoa $savecountTime,%savecountTime mod 60
		if %savecountTime mod 60 < 10 add $ts_session,"0"
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime
		add $ts_session, " " ;Original Edited - needed to prevent the cut on the right part of the text - W_CUSTOM

		add $ts_session,"{n}" + sess_real_world + ": "
		time %Hour,%Minute,%SaveTime
		date %Year,%Month,%Day
		if %Day < 10 add $ts_session,"0"
		itoa $savecountTime,%Day
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime + "/"
		if %Month < 10 add $ts_session,"0"
		itoa $savecountTime,%Month
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime + "/20"
		if %Year < 10 add $ts_session,"0"
		itoa $savecountTime,%Year
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime + " "
		if %Hour < 10 add $ts_session,"0"
		itoa $savecountTime,%Hour
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime + ":"
		if %Minute < 10 add $ts_session,"0"
		itoa $savecountTime,%Minute
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime + ":"
		if %SaveTime < 10 add $ts_session,"0"
		itoa $savecountTime,%SaveTime
		add $ts_session,$savecountTime
		add $ts_session, "    " ;Original Edited - needed to prevent the cut on the right part of the text - W_CUSTOM
		
		add $ts_session,"{n}" + sess_current_track + ": "
		if %bgm_current_id != 0 add $ts_session,$BGM_Title + "}`"
		if %bgm_current_id == 0 add $ts_session,"}`"
		add $ts_session, "{n}" ;Original Edited - needed to prevent the cut on the bottom part of the text - W_CUSTOM

		border_pad_pop
		
		lsp r_info_lsp,$ts_session,35,840
		return

		;%r_display values:
		;0 - chars
		;1 - tips
		;2 - grim
		;3 - log

*rmenu_lookback
lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0
print 10,500
_csp 2
goto *text_cw_lookback

;----------------------------------------
;Click right system, the main menu

*rmenu_main
	btndef ""

	goto *rmenu_main_new

;********************************************************************************
; Image cleanup routine
*r_image_cleanup
	_csp 97,r_used_lsp
	_csp r_bg_lsp
	_csp r_black_lsp
	_csp name_chapter_r_click
	;Text Generator - clear r_menu - W_CUSTOM
	csp_text gen_txt_1 : csp_text gen_txt_2 : csp_text gen_txt_3 : csp_text gen_txt_4 : csp_text gen_txt_5
	csp_text gen_txt_6 : csp_text gen_txt_7 : csp_text gen_txt_8 : csp_text gen_txt_9
	csp_text gen_txt_11 : csp_text gen_txt_12 : csp_text gen_txt_13 : csp_text gen_txt_14 : csp_text gen_txt_15
	csp_text gen_txt_16 : csp_text gen_txt_17 : csp_text gen_txt_18
	csp_text gen_txt_10 ;Text Generator - clean chapter name - W_CUSTOM
	_csp 451
return
;********************************************************************************


;********************************************************************************
; Right-click exit processing system
*r_exit
	btndef ""
	gosub *r_image_cleanup
	if %monoflg = 1 mono 1
	if %monoflg = 2 mono 2
	if %monoflg = 3 mono 3
	blur 0
	seplay 9,1005,100
	print 1
	texton2
	if %skip_flg_bak == on skip_on
return ;Right-click exit the system

;-------------------------------------
; Right-click exit processing system (no sound)
*r_exit2
	btndef ""
	gosub *r_image_cleanup
	if %monoflg = 1 mono 1
	if %monoflg = 2 mono 2
	if %monoflg = 3 mono 3
	blur 0
	print 1
	texton2
	if %skip_flg_bak == on skip_on
return ;Right-click exit the system

;-------------------------------------
; Right-click exit processing system (for bg-view)
*r_exit3
	btndef ""
	gosub *r_image_cleanup
	if %monoflg = 1 mono 1
	if %monoflg = 2 mono 2
	if %monoflg = 3 mono 3
	blur 0
	print 1
	if %skip_flg_bak == on skip_on
return ;Right-click exit the system

;********************************************************************************


;********************************************************************************
;Viewing Tips, Tips fly to display processing of each


;********************************************************************************

;********************************************************************************
;View of Grimoire, fly to display processing of each Grimoire


;********************************************************************************



;********************************************************************************
;Standing picture display of the character, the text, every character of each processing
*r_cha_display
	
	;if %r_display_cha = 0 return ;ep1,2,2_2,3,4
	if %r_side = 0 if %r_display_cha = 0 return
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 0 if %r_display_cha = 0 return
	if %scenario_Number = 3 && %r_side = 1 if %r_display_cha_ma = 0 return ;ep3_2,	
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 1 if %r_display_cha_ma = 0 return  ;ep4_2
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 2 if %r_display_cha_enj = 0 return ;ep4_3
	
	mov %r_display,0
	;_csp r_tips_txt_lsp
	;_csp r_grim_txt_lsp
	;vsp r_hana_lsp,1
	;_csp r_change_lsp
	
	if %scenario_Number = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep1
	if %scenario_Number = 2 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_display_ep2
	if %scenario_Number = 2 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep2_2
	if %scenario_Number = 3 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_display_ep3
	if %scenario_Number = 3 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep3_2
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *r_cha_display_ep4
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep4_2
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 2 goto *r_cha_display_ep4_3	
	if %scenario_Number = 5 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_display_ep5
	if %scenario_Number = 5 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep5_2
	if %scenario_Number = 6 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_display_ep6
	if %scenario_Number = 6 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep6_2
	if %scenario_Number = 6 && %r_side = 2 goto *r_cha_display_ep6_3
	if %scenario_Number = 7 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_display_ep7
	if %scenario_Number = 7 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep7_2
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_display_ep8
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_display_ep8_2
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_side = 2 goto *r_cha_display_ep8_3

;If the character icon is pressed, you jump to each character
*r_cha_display_ep1
	if %r_display_cha = kin : gosub *r_cha_kin
	if %r_display_cha = kla : gosub *r_cha_kla
	if %r_display_cha = nat : gosub *r_cha_nat
	if %r_display_cha = jes : gosub *r_cha_jes
	if %r_display_cha = hid : gosub *r_cha_hid
	if %r_display_cha = eva : gosub *r_cha_eva
	if %r_display_cha = geo : gosub *r_cha_geo
	if %r_display_cha = rud : gosub *r_cha_rud
	if %r_display_cha = kir : gosub *r_cha_kir
	if %r_display_cha = but : gosub *r_cha_but
	if %r_display_cha = ros : gosub *r_cha_ros
	if %r_display_cha = mar : gosub *r_cha_mar
	if %r_display_cha = nan : gosub *r_cha_nan
 	if %r_display_cha = gen : gosub *r_cha_gen
	if %r_display_cha = kum : gosub *r_cha_kum
	if %r_display_cha = goh : gosub *r_cha_goh
	if %r_display_cha = sha : gosub *r_cha_sha
	if %r_display_cha = kan : gosub *r_cha_kan
	if %r_display_cha = bea : gosub *r_cha_bea
	if %r_display_cha = ber : gosub *r_cha_ber
	
goto *r_cha_display_end
	
*r_cha_display_ep2
	;W_CUSTOM - ;Outfits
	if %r_display_cha = kin : gosub *r_cha_kin_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = kla : gosub *r_cha_kla_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = nat : gosub *r_cha_nat_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = jes : gosub *r_cha_jes_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = hid : gosub *r_cha_hid_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = eva : gosub *r_cha_eva_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = geo : gosub *r_cha_geo_ep2 
	if %r_display_cha = rud : gosub *r_cha_rud_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = kir : gosub *r_cha_kir_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = but : gosub *r_cha_but_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = ros : gosub *r_cha_ros_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = mar : gosub *r_cha_mar_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = nan : gosub *r_cha_nan_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = gen : gosub *r_cha_gen_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = kum : gosub *r_cha_kum_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = goh : gosub *r_cha_goh_ep2
	if %r_display_cha = sha : gosub *r_cha_sha_ep2 
	if %r_display_cha = kan : gosub *r_cha_kan_ep2 
	if %r_display_cha = bea : gosub *r_cha_bea_ep2 
	if %r_display_cha = ber : error "Insane code"
	
goto *r_cha_display_end

*r_cha_display_ep2_2
	if %r_display_cha = ma_kin : gosub *r_cha_kin_ep2_2
	if %r_display_cha = ma_but : gosub *r_cha_but_ep2_2
	if %r_display_cha = ma_mar : gosub *r_cha_mar_ep2_2
 	if %r_display_cha = ma_gen : gosub *r_cha_gen_ep2_2
	if %r_display_cha = ma_sha : gosub *r_cha_sha_ep2_2

	;if %r_display_cha = si : gosub *r_cha_si_ep8
	;if %r_display_cha = eri : gosub *r_cha_eri_ep8
	if %r_display_cha = bea : gosub *r_cha_bea_ep8

goto *r_cha_display_end

*r_cha_display_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_lam : gosub *r_cha_lam_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ber : gosub *r_cha_ber_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_bea : gosub *r_cha_bea_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_wal : gosub *r_cha_wal_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ron : gosub *r_cha_ron_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_gap : gosub *r_cha_gap_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_s45 : gosub *r_cha_s45_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_s410 : gosub *r_cha_s410_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_s00 : gosub *r_cha_s00_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_s556 : gosub *r_cha_s556_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_rg : gosub *r_cha_rg_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_rg_1 : gosub *r_cha_rg_1_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_rg_2 : gosub *r_cha_rg_2_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_rg_3 : gosub *r_cha_rg_3_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_rg_4 : gosub *r_cha_rg_4_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_rg_5 : gosub *r_cha_rg_5_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_rg_6 : gosub *r_cha_rg_6_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_eri : gosub *r_cha_eri_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_dla : gosub *r_cha_dla_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ger : gosub *r_cha_ger_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_cor : gosub *r_cha_cor_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_but : gosub *r_cha_but_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_zep : gosub *r_cha_ZEP_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_fur : gosub *r_cha_FUR_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_goa : gosub *r_cha_GOA_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_wil : gosub *r_cha_WIL_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_en2 : gosub *r_cha_EN2_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_bb : gosub *r_cha_bb_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_wr : gosub *r_cha_wr_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ev2 : gosub *r_cha_ev2_ep8_2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_fea : gosub *r_cha_fea_ep8_2
	
goto *r_cha_display_end

*r_cha_display_ep8_3
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ENJ : gosub *r_cha_enj_ep8_3
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_AMA : gosub *r_cha_AMA_ep8_3
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_FEA : gosub *r_cha_FEA_ep8_3
	
goto *r_cha_display_end
	
*r_cha_display_end

aspt alpha,gen_txt_14,255,300 ;CharSelectorFix

;W_CUSTOM - ;Outfits
	if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 0 jumpf
	if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 0 jumpf
		if %r_display_cha = jes gosub *outfit_change_register jes_btn_lsp : jumpf
		if %r_display_cha = geo gosub *outfit_change_register geo_btn_lsp : jumpf
		if %r_display_cha = sha gosub *outfit_change_register sha_btn_lsp : jumpf
		if %r_display_cha = kan gosub *outfit_change_register kan_btn_lsp : jumpf
		if %r_display_cha = bea gosub *outfit_change_register bea_btn_lsp : jumpf
	~
	if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 1 jumpf
	if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 1 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number = 3 if %r_display_cha_ma = ma3_ev2 gosub *outfit_change_register ma3_ev2_btn_lsp : jumpf
		if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ev2 gosub *outfit_change_register ma5_ev2_btn_lsp : jumpf
	~
	if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 2 jumpf
	if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 2 jumpf
		if %r_display_cha_enj = enj_enj gosub *outfit_change_register enj_enj_btn_lsp
	~

	if %char_is_selected == 0 aspt xpos,r_info_lsp,0,500 : mov %char_is_selected,1 ;W_CUSTOM ;Char Menu - needed for drawer animation
	;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Select char
	;vsp gen_txt_14,1
	mov %r_display_cha_universal,%r_display_cha
	if %scenario_Number > 2 && %r_side = 1 mov %r_display_cha_universal,%r_display_cha_ma
	if %scenario_Number > 2 && %r_side = 2 mov %r_display_cha_universal,%r_display_cha_enj

		aspt xpos,gen_txt_14,?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][itiran_x]
		aspt ypos,gen_txt_14,?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][itiran_y];+2
		sptwait ypos,gen_txt_14

	;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Moving Side Animations
	if %char_performing_action != 0 jumpf ;If not executing or resurrecting
		if %char_selector_ep_change = 1	aspt alpha,gen_txt_14,0,300 : aspt alpha,r_hana_lsp,0,200,1
		if %char_selector_ep_change != 1 aspt alpha,gen_txt_14,255,300 : aspt alpha,r_hana_lsp,255,800,2 ;There are two of this
		;sptwait alpha,gen_txt_14
	~
	if %char_performing_action != 0 if %char_selector_ep_change = 1 aspt alpha,r_hana_lsp,255

    ;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Action disabling
        ;execute btn disabling
	if %r_for_title = 0 jumpf

		;debug_var %mchar_state
		;debug_var %scenario_Number
		;debug_var %r_display_cha_universal
		;debug_var ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition]
		;debug_str "======="

		_csp r_change_lsp
		lsp r_blog_lsp,char_outfit_btn_disabled,369,743
		lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn_disabled,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"
		lsp r_resu_lsp,char_action_btn_disabled,120,807 : write_special_text gen_txt_18,"char_action",124,806,char_resurrect_label,"disabled"

		;In this cases no execution/resurrection is allowed
		if %scenario_Number = 2 && %r_side = 1 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number = 3 && %r_side = 1 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 2 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number = 6 && %r_display_side = 2 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 2 jumpf
		
			if %mchar_state=1 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 3 lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn_disabled,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"
			if %mchar_state=0 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 2 lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn_disabled,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"
			if %mchar_state=2 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 1 lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn_disabled,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"

			if %mchar_state=1 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 2 lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"enabled"
			if %mchar_state=0 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 1 lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"enabled"
			if %mchar_state=2 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 0 lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"enabled"

			;Does this work?
			if %mchar_state=1 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 1 lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"enabled"

			;resurrect btn disabling
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 1 lsp r_resu_lsp,char_action_btn_disabled,120,807 : write_special_text gen_txt_18,"char_action",124,806,char_resurrect_label,"disabled"
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 2 lsp r_resu_lsp,char_action_btn,120,807 : write_special_text gen_txt_18,"char_action",124,806,char_resurrect_label,"enabled"
			
			;Does this work?
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_universal][condition] = 3 lsp r_resu_lsp,char_action_btn,120,807 : write_special_text gen_txt_18,"char_action",124,806,char_resurrect_label,"enabled"

	~

	;if %char_selector_ep_change = 1 _csp 2; This clears the black screen when changing episodes in char menu: print 10,500
	if %char_selector_ep_change = 1 seplay 9,1010,100


	gosub *r_cha_display_right_left

return

;W_CUSTOM ;Char Menu - Char click text effect (no edits)
*r_cha_display_right_left
	sptwait xpos,cha_lsp
	sptwait alpha,cha_lsp
	lsp cha_lsp,$r_cha_tati_path,1775,40,0;char bust x and y
	write_special_text r_system_lsp,"char_desc",660,140,$r_txt_path ;char desc txt
	aspt scroll_h,r_system_lsp,828 ;scroll text
	vsp 99,0 : vsp 98,0 : mov %r_display_arrow,0 ;disable the arrows
	scroll_exceeds %r_display_arrow,r_system_lsp
	if %r_display_arrow = 1 vsp 99,1 : vsp 98,1 : mov %r_display_arrow,r_system_lsp
	aspt alpha,cha_lsp,255,500
	spt xpos,cha_lsp,-480,500 ;1750->1250 ;char bust x
	;Make text appear with anim on drawer opening
	;vsp r_system_lsp,1
	if %char_is_selected == 0 aspt xpos,r_system_lsp,660,500 ;: aspt alpha,r_system_lsp,255,800
	;if %char_is_selected == 1 aspt alpha,r_system_lsp,255
return

;*******************************************************
; Character information display
;
; Picture Chara Standing
; (Do not change such as name, age, difficult part) 1 comment
; (Where you change the current situation, etc., in some situations) 2 comments
; Button switching character < >
;
;*******************************************************

;******************************************
; Standing picture display of the characters
; Move to the routine details of every character.
;******************************************
;-----EP1------
;------------------------------
*r_cha_kin
;State, change the comment by progression
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 0 return
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 1 mov $r_cha_tati_path,":a;graphics\big_chars\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\ep1_1_kin_EP1_1_kin.png"
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 2 mov $r_cha_tati_path,":a;graphics\big_chars\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\ep1_1_kin_m_EP1_1_kin_m.png"
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 3 mov $r_cha_tati_path,":a;graphics\big_chars\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\ep1_1_kin_d_EP1_1_kin_d.png"
;(Show text sentence according to the state)
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 0 mov $r_txt_path,":a;graphics\menu\chars\chars_right.png"
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 1 mov $r_txt_path,chars_1_kin_1
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 2 mov $r_txt_path,chars_1_kin_2
	if ?r[1][%r_display_cha][condition] = 3 mov $r_txt_path,chars_1_kin_3
return

;if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou] = 2 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][condition] = 1 mov $r_cha_tati_path,":a;graphics\big_chars\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\ep8_2_en2_1_EP8_2_en2_1.png" : mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][tati_x],440 : lsp ma5_en2_btn_lsp,":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_enj0_s.png",?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][itiran_y]

;if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou]   = 2 mov $r_cha_tati_path,":a;graphics\big_chars\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\ep8_2_en2_1_EP8_2_en2_1.png"

~

	if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][condition] = 0 return

	if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][condition] = 2 mov $r_txt_path,chars_8_3_enj_2

return

~
mov %free1, ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou]
itoa $Free1,%Free1
add$Free1,","
mov %free1, ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][condition]
itoa $Free2,%Free1
add $Free1,$Free2
caption $Free1
click
end

;------------------------------

;**************************************************************
; Right-click feature back title
; Out a confirmation message, do the processing.
;**************************************************************
*rmenu_title_back
	;x: x2+330, y: x2
	;Display of the confirmation message
	lsp title_back_bg_lsp,title_back_bg,716,342,230

	;lsp title_back_yes_lsp,title_back_yes,762,432

	;Text Generator - yes and no r menu - W_CUSTOM
	;We use t_txt_ep?_lsp as id to prevent any kind of conflict having used all 10 gen_txt in the r-menu
	lsp title_back_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,762,432
	write_special_text gen_txt_11,"left",762+19,432+3,yes_btn_txt
	lsp title_back_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,762,508
	write_special_text gen_txt_12,"left",762+19,508+3,no_btn_txt
	;End Custom
	print 1

	btndef ""
	
	spbtn title_back_yes_lsp,title_back_yes_lsp
	spbtn title_back_no_lsp,title_back_no_lsp
	
	*rmenu_title_back_btn_lp

	btnwait2 %tmp
	
	notif %tmp = title_back_yes_lsp jumpf
		seplay 9,1001,100
		resettimer
		btndef ""
		csp_grst
		E_A
		waittimer 250
		seplay 9,18,100
		bg black,18,3000,msk_kanon_r
		delay 500
		goto *quick_reload
	~

	if %tmp = title_back_no_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : _csp title_back_bg_lsp : _csp title_back_yes_lsp : _csp title_back_no_lsp : csp_text gen_txt_11 : csp_text gen_txt_12 : return
	if %tmp = -1 _csp title_back_bg_lsp : _csp title_back_yes_lsp : _csp title_back_no_lsp : csp_text gen_txt_11 : csp_text gen_txt_12  : return ;Exit by right-clicking
	if %tmp = -10 _csp title_back_bg_lsp : _csp title_back_yes_lsp : _csp title_back_no_lsp : csp_text gen_txt_11 : csp_text gen_txt_12  : return ;Exit by ESC
	
	
	goto *rmenu_title_back_btn_lp

;**************************************************************


;*********************************************************
; Version EP2 right-click menu
; Created 17 Nov 2007
;*********************************************************

;----------------------------------------
; Click right system, the main menu

;Version EP4 right-click menu
;2008/06/05

; Click right system, the main menu

;*********************************************************
;EP5
;*********************************************************


;******************************************************************
;display relevant data from menu
;******************************************************************
;---------------------------------

;Scene 0 (start game)
*rmenu_main_ep4_3_scene_40000
	mov ?r[4][enj_eva][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][enj_enj][condition],1
	;background lines
	mov $r_cha_back,blank
return
;---------------------------------
*rmenu_main_ep4_2_scene_40001
	mov ?r[4][ma4_enj][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][ma4_ber][condition],1

	;background lines
	mov $r_cha_back,blank

	mov ?r[4][ma4_enj][itiran_x],224+81-28-57 : mov %tmp,96 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][ma4_enj][itiran_y],366
	mov ?r[4][ma4_ber][itiran_x],224+81+28 : mov %tmp,96 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][ma4_ber][itiran_y],366
return
;---------------------------------
*rmenu_main_ep4_2_scene_40005
	mov ?r[4][ma4_ber][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][ma4_lam][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][ma4_enj][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][ma4_mar][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][ma4_bea][condition],1
	
	;background lines
	mov $r_cha_back,char_tree_4m1
	
	mov ?r[4][ma4_lam][itiran_x],330-130-12+2 : mov %tmp,5 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][ma4_lam][itiran_y],366-31-16
	mov ?r[4][ma4_ber][itiran_x],590-190-36-2 : mov %tmp,5 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][ma4_ber][itiran_y],366-31-16

	mov ?r[4][ma4_bea][itiran_x],330-130-12+2 : mov %tmp,48 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][ma4_bea][itiran_y],366+31+16
	mov ?r[4][ma4_mar][itiran_x],460-160-24 : mov %tmp,48 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][ma4_mar][itiran_y],366+31+16
	mov ?r[4][ma4_enj][itiran_x],590-190-36-2 : mov %tmp,48 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][ma4_enj][itiran_y],366+31+16
return
;---------------------------------
*rmenu_main_ep4_3_scene_40030
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep4_3 : mov ?r[4][%tmp][condition],-1 : next
	mov ?r[4][enj_enj][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][enj_eva][condition],1
	
	;background lines
	mov $r_cha_back,char_tree_4a1
	
	mov ?r[4][enj_eva][itiran_x],460-160-24 : mov %tmp,96 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_eva][itiran_y],366-31-16
	mov ?r[4][enj_enj][itiran_x],460-160-24 : mov %tmp,96 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_enj][itiran_y],366+31+16
	
return
;---------------------------------
*rmenu_main_ep4_3_scene_40040
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep4_3 : mov ?r[4][%tmp][condition],-1 : next
	mov ?r[4][enj_enj][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][enj_eva][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][enj_oko][condition],1
	
	;background lines
	mov $r_cha_back,char_tree_4a2
	
	mov ?r[4][enj_eva][itiran_x],460-160-24-45 : mov %tmp,96 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_eva][itiran_y],366-31-16
	mov ?r[4][enj_oko][itiran_x],590-190-36-2-45 : mov %tmp,96 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_oko][itiran_y],366-31-16
	mov ?r[4][enj_enj][itiran_x],460-160-24-45 : mov %tmp,96 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_enj][itiran_y],366+31+16

return
;---------------------------------
*rmenu_main_ep4_3_scene_40050
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep4_3 : mov ?r[4][%tmp][condition],-1 : next
	mov ?r[4][enj_enj][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][enj_eva][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][enj_oko][condition],1
	mov ?r[4][enj_kas][condition],1
	
	;background lines
	mov $r_cha_back,char_tree_4a3
	
	mov ?r[4][enj_eva][itiran_x],460-160-24+45   : mov %tmp,7 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_eva][itiran_y],366-31-16
	mov ?r[4][enj_oko][itiran_x],590-190-36-2+45 : mov %tmp,7 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_oko][itiran_y],366-31-16
	mov ?r[4][enj_kas][itiran_x],200-100-0+4+45  : mov %tmp,52 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_kas][itiran_y],366+31+16
	mov ?r[4][enj_enj][itiran_x],460-160-24+45 : mov %tmp,52 : add %tmp,r_top_y : mov ?r[4][enj_enj][itiran_y],366+31+16
	
return

			drawsp 11,1,255,%tmp1,30+135

			drawsp 13,1,255,%tmp1,30+135*3
			drawsp 14,1,255,%tmp1,30+135*4
			drawsp 15,1,255,%tmp1,30+135*5
			drawsp 16,1,255,%tmp1,30+135*6
			drawsp 17,1,255,%tmp1,30+135*7
			sub %tmp1,100
		*pettann_100

		notif %tmp10 >= 9500 goto *pettann_150 ;6500
		notif %tmp10 <= 16500 goto *pettann_150 ;10000
			drawsp 80,1,255,%tmp8,30
			drawsp 81,1,255,%tmp8,30+65
			drawsp 82,1,255,%tmp8,30+65*2
			drawsp 83,1,255,%tmp8,30+65*5
			drawsp 84,1,255,%tmp8,30+65*6
			drawsp 85,1,255,%tmp8,30+65*7
			drawsp 110,1,255,%tmp8,1000-45*10
			drawsp 111,1,255,%tmp8,1000-45*9
			drawsp 112,1,255,%tmp8,1000-45*8

			drawsp 118,1,255,%tmp8,1000-45*2
			drawsp 119,1,255,%tmp8,1000-45
			drawsp 120,1,255,%tmp8,1000
			sub %tmp8,60
		*pettann_150


		notif %tmp10 >= 13500 goto *pettann_200 ;8000
		notif %tmp10 <= 18500 goto *pettann_200 ;11000
			drawsp 40,1,255,%tmp4,30
			drawsp 41,1,255,%tmp4,30+135

			drawsp 45,1,255,%tmp4,30+135*5
			drawsp 46,1,255,%tmp4,30+135*6
			drawsp 47,1,255,%tmp4,30+135*7
			sub %tmp4,100
		*pettann_200

		notif %tmp10 >= 16000 goto *pettann_250 ;9500
		notif %tmp10 <= 22500 goto *pettann_250 ;13000
			drawsp 70,1,255,%tmp7,30
			drawsp 71,1,255,%tmp7,30+65
			drawsp 72,1,255,%tmp7,30+135*2

			drawsp 75,1,255,%tmp7,980-65*2
			drawsp 76,1,255,%tmp7,980-65
			drawsp 77,1,255,%tmp7,980
			sub %tmp7,60
		*pettann_250


		notif %tmp10 >= 19000 goto *pettann_300 ;11000
		notif %tmp10 <= 24500 goto *pettann_300 ;13500
			drawsp 50,1,255,%tmp5,30
			drawsp 51,1,255,%tmp5,30+135
			drawsp 52,1,255,%tmp5,251
			drawsp 53,1,255,%tmp5,251+135

			drawsp 55,1,255,%tmp5,251+135*3
			drawsp 56,1,255,%tmp5,30+135*6
			drawsp 57,1,255,%tmp5,30+135*7
			sub %tmp5,100
		*pettann_300

		notif %tmp10 >= 21000 goto *pettann_350 ;12000
		notif %tmp10 <= 27700 goto *pettann_350 ;16000
			drawsp 90,1,255,%tmp9,30
			drawsp 91,1,255,%tmp9,869-30
			;drawsp 92,1,255,%tmp9,120

		*pettann_350

		notif %tmp10 >= 24500 goto *pettann_400 ;13500
		notif %tmp10 <= 29500 goto *pettann_400 ;16000
			drawsp 60,1,255,%tmp6,30
			drawsp 61,1,255,%tmp6,30+135
			drawsp 62,1,255,%tmp6,251

			drawsp 64,1,255,%tmp6,251+135*2
			drawsp 65,1,255,%tmp6,251+135*3
			drawsp 66,1,255,%tmp6,30+135*6
			drawsp 67,1,255,%tmp6,30+135*7
			sub %tmp6,100
		*pettann_400

		notif %tmp10 >= 27000 goto *pettann_500 ;15000
		notif %tmp10 <= 32000 goto *pettann_500 ;20000
			drawsp 100,1,255,%tmp11,30
			drawsp 101,1,255,%tmp11,30+135
			drawsp 102,1,255,%tmp11,30+135*2
			drawsp 103,1,255,%tmp11,30+135*3
			drawsp 104,1,255,%tmp11,30+135*4
			drawsp 105,1,255,%tmp11,30+135*5
			drawsp 106,1,255,%tmp11,30+135*6
			drawsp 107,1,255,%tmp11,30+135*7
			sub %tmp11,100
		*pettann_500

	draw
	waittimer %tmp10
next
;bg "bmp\pettan\bg.bmp",0
drawclear
drawend
csp_grst
gosub *textoff2
border_pad_pop
set_name_window_non
skip_on

return

#locale_import "save_load_menu.txt"

;***********************************************************************
;Main launcher
;***********************************************************************
*boot_logo

E_B
E_MA
saveoff            ;Speedup the process by disabling game save
rmode 0            ;Speedup the process by disabling right-click menu
gosub *textoff2
setfps 60
skip_off           ;Disable skip for main menus
mov %skip_flg_bak,off
mov %no_cache_atm,off

;-----------------------
;Display the logos
;Click left and right to skip the display of the logo and go to the title screen   
;-----------------------

if %title_skip = 1 goto *boot_logo_skip
isdown %tmp
if %tmp = 1 goto *boot_logo_skip
lr_trap *boot_logo_skip

lsp 100,":c;graphics\system\logo\alchemist.png",0,0
print 10,2000
wait2 2000

lsp 100,":c;graphics\colour\white.png",0,0
print 10,2000

lsp 100,":c;graphics\system\logo\07th.png",0,0
print 10,2000
wait2 2000

lsp 100,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0
print 10,1000

lsp 100,project_logo,0,0

aspt blur,100,5000
aspt alpha,100,0
print 1
dwaveloop 16,"sound\se\umilse_016.ogg"
ach_prop 16,%sfx_vol,700
aspt blur,100,1,3000
aspt alpha,100,255,2000
aspt alpha,100,255,3000
aspt alpha,100,0,3000
aspt blur,100,1,1000
aspt blur,100,5000,3000
sptwait blur,100
ach_prop 16,0,2000
wait2 2000
_csp 100
print 10,500

;Done with logos
goto *boot_logo_skip_100

*boot_logo_skip
	mov %title_skip,1
	_csp 100

*boot_logo_skip_100
	lr_trap off

	mov %Free1,off
	mov %anim_mode,off

	if %UMINEKOEND > 0 mov %Free1,on
	if $flag_scenario_1_op == "●" mov %Free1,on
	if %title_skip > 0 mov %Free1,off
	if %Free1 != on goto *boot_logo_no_video

	if %CHIRU_MODE == 0 mov $Free1,"op"
	if %CHIRU_MODE == 1 mov $Free1,"op4"

	pam 100,$Free1,1
	mov %Free1,off

*boot_logo_no_video

	if %anim_mode == on flush 23 ;trapped
	if %anim_mode == off flush 1
	

	;Enable rclick menu
	rmode 1
	btndef ""
	csp_rst

;***********************************************************************
;Main menu
;***********************************************************************
*b_title

clearlog 1
mov $log_choices,""
mov %log_is_generated_to_cvs,-1

gosub *textoff2 ;W_TEMP

;Create session
gosub *trophy_session_create

mono 0

;reset characters
;if %CHIRU_MODE != 0 jumpf
for %tmp2 = 1 to 4
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max
		mov ?r[%tmp2][%tmp][condition],0
	next
next
;~

;if %CHIRU_MODE != 1 jumpf
for %tmp2 = 5 to 8
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep5
		mov ?r[%tmp2][%tmp][condition],0
	next
next
;~

gosub *chain_sprites

;Parametrs mouse Tips
mov %r_display_cha,0
mov %r_display_cha_ma,0
mov %r_side,0
mov %r_display_side,0
mov %r_display_tips,0
mov %r_display_grim,0
mov %r_for_title,0
mov %r_tea_bea,0
mov %r_ber_flg,0
mov %r_mode_flg,off	;Remove right-click the OFF
mov %r_u_tea_flg,0 ;Right-click for tea
mov %omake,0

;Initialize tips and grimoir
for %tmp = 0 to 10
	mov ?tips[%tmp][tips_flg],0
next
for %tmp = 0 to 15
	mov ?grim[%tmp][grim_flg],0
next

;Initialize scene variables
mov %play_scene,0
mov %grim_scene,0
mov %skip_flg,on

;Initialise config values
operate_config read,$current_renderer,"prefer-renderer"
operate_config read,$window_size,"window-width"
operate_config read,$full_window_auto,"fullscreen"
if $full_window_auto == "noval" mov %full_window_auto,2 : jumpf
operate_config read,$full_window_auto,"window"
if $full_window_auto == "noval" mov %full_window_auto,1 : jumpf
mov %full_window_auto,0
~

;Initialise border_padding stack
mov %b_pad_counter,-1
border_pad_push 0

;Reset audiosystem
E_A
gosub *lv_generate
gosub *se_generate
gosub *me_generate
; Cake test
; mov %title_skip,0 : goto *d58138

if $omake_return == "trailer" mov %title_skip,0 : mov %r_mode_flg,1 : goto *omake_chiru_menu
if $omake_return == "omake"   mov %title_skip,0 : mov %r_mode_flg,1 : goto *omake_chiru_menu
if $omake_return == "omake8"  mov %title_skip,0 : mov %r_mode_flg,1 : goto *omake_chiru_menu
if $omake_return == "omake9"  mov %title_skip,0 : mov %r_mode_flg,1 : goto *omake_chiru_menu

;rondo
if %CHIRU_MODE != 0 jumpf
;Background image, default sfx
if %UMINEKOEND = 0 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep1_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 1 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep1_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 11 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep1_1 ;End ep 1
if %UMINEKOEND = 12 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep1_1 ;End tea 1
;if $flag_scenario_1_1 == "●" meplay 1,12,100 : mov $tmp10,":c;backgrounds\m_o1ar.png" ;W_TEMP

if %UMINEKOEND = 20 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep2_1 ;End ??? 1
if %UMINEKOEND = 21 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep2_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 22 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep2_1

if %UMINEKOEND = 30 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep3_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 31 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep3_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 32 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep3_1

if %UMINEKOEND = 40 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep4_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 41 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep4_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 42 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep4_1
if %UMINEKOEND >= 50 meplay 1,16,50 : mov $tmp10,title_ep4_2
~
;end

;chiru
if %CHIRU_MODE != 1 jumpf
;Background image, default sfx
if %UMINEKOEND = 50 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep5_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 51 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep5_1
if %UMINEKOEND = 52 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep5_1

if %UMINEKOEND = 82 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep8_2
if %UMINEKOEND >= 90 meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,title_ep8_3
~
;end

;Saku menu - background - W_CUSTOM
if %CHIRU_MODE != 2 jumpf
meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,":c;backgrounds\ps3\glib_1a.png"
;meplay 1,2,100 : mov $tmp10,":c;backgrounds\fea_l4.png"
~
;End Custom

mov %title_y,140

csp_rst
btndef ""

set_window_simple 1,1
setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"

;Background display logo
if %CHIRU_MODE != 0 jumpf
lsph t_logo_lsp,t_logo_rondo,860,45
~

lsph t_logo_lsp,t_logo_chiru,860,45
~

lsph t_logo_lsp,t_logo_saku,855,45
~

;Button placement

	;Original Edited - Changed different values and conditions (basically remade and reordered everything) - W_CUSTOM

	lsph t_btn_start_lsp,title_btn_1,1325,424
	write_special_text gen_txt_11,"title_btn_txt",1325,424,title_start_txt
	lsph t_btn_web_lsp,title_btn_2,1325,488
	write_special_text gen_txt_12,"title_btn_txt",1325,488,to_extra_btn_txt

	if %UMINEKOEND = 0 lsph t_btn_exit_lsp,title_btn_4,1325,616 : write_special_text gen_txt_20,"title_btn_txt",1325,616,title_exit_txt

	if %UMINEKOEND = 11 lsph t_config_lsp,title_btn_3,1325,552 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"title_btn_txt",1325,552,title_config_txt
	if %UMINEKOEND = 11 lsph t_cg_lsp,title_btn_4,1325,616 : write_special_text gen_txt_18,"title_btn_txt",1325,616,title_cg_txt

	if %UMINEKOEND = 12 lsph t_config_lsp,title_btn_4,1325,616 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"title_btn_txt",1325,616,title_config_txt

	if %UMINEKOEND = 12 lsph t_btn_music_lsp,title_btn_6,1325,744 : write_special_text gen_txt_19,"title_btn_txt",1325,744,title_bgm_txt

	if %UMINEKOEND >= 20 lsph t_chars_lsp,title_btn_5,1325,680 : write_special_text gen_txt_15,"title_btn_txt",1325,680,title_char_txt 
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 20 lsph t_btn_tips_lsp,title_btn_6,1325,744 : write_special_text gen_txt_16,"title_btn_txt",1325,744,title_tips_txt

	;Final Position

	if %UMINEKOEND >= 20 && %UMINEKOEND_MUSIC_FLG = 1 lsph t_btn_music_lsp,title_btn_9_new,1325,936

	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_FLG = 4 lsph t_btn_tips_lsp,title_btn_6_new,1325,744

; Definitions and buttons, click the button for processing
*b_title_button_loop
	btndef ""
	transbtn
	;Text Generator - all display strings have been adapted to the new sprite ids - W_CUSTOM
	exbtn_d "C37-56P9-36C122-125C132-137C139-149C161C163C165"
	exbtn t_btn_start_lsp,t_btn_start_lsp,"P165P143"
	exbtn t_btn_web_lsp,t_btn_web_lsp,"P165P147"
	exbtn t_btn_tea_lsp,t_btn_tea_lsp,"P165P146"
	exbtn t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,"P165P141"
	exbtn t_chars_lsp,t_chars_lsp,"P165P163"
	exbtn t_btn_tips_lsp,t_btn_tips_lsp,"P165P145"
	exbtn t_config_lsp,t_config_lsp,"P165P161"
	exbtn t_cg_lsp,t_cg_lsp,"P165P149"
	exbtn t_btn_music_lsp,t_btn_music_lsp,"P165P144"
	exbtn t_btn_exit_lsp,t_btn_exit_lsp,"P165P142"
	spbtn t_trophy_lsp,t_trophy_lsp
	if %omake = 0 spbtn t_btn_omake_lsp,t_btn_omake_lsp
	if %omake = 1 spbtn t_btn_omake_lsp,t_btn_omake_end_lsp
	btntime 30000
	btnwait2 %BtnRes

	if %BtnRes = t_btn_start_lsp cell t_btn_start_lsp,1 : print 1 : btndef "" : goto *start_sub_menu
	;if %BtnRes = t_btn_web_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : menu_window : shell "http://07th-expansion.net"
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_web_lsp if %CHIRU_MODE != 2 seplay 9,1001,100 : goto *switch_game_to_extra
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_web_lsp if %CHIRU_MODE == 2 seplay 9,1001,100 : goto *switch_game_to_normal
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_tea_lsp cell t_btn_tea_lsp,1 : print 1 : btndef "" : goto *tea_sub_menu
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_ura_tea_lsp cell t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,1 : print 1 : btndef "" : goto *ura_tea_sub_menu
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_tips_lsp cell t_btn_tips_lsp,1 : print 1 : btndef "" : goto *tips_sub_menu
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_exit_lsp seplay 9,18,100 : csp_rst : vol_me 1,-1,2500 : bg black,18,3000,msk_kanon_r : wait 3000 : end
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_music_lsp seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *bgm_mode_ps3 : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %BtnRes = t_chars_lsp cell t_chars_lsp,1 : print 1 : btndef "" : goto *char_sub_menu
	if %BtnRes = t_cg_lsp csp_rst : seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *cg_mode_ps3 : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %BtnRes = t_trophy_lsp csp_rst : seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *trophy_ps3 : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %BtnRes = t_config_lsp csp_rst : seplay 9,1001,100 : gosub *settings : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_omake_lsp && %omake_level > 1 mov %scenario_Number,5 mov %omake,1 : goto *umi_start
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 0 && %BtnRes = t_btn_omake_lsp gosub *omake_sub_menu
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 && %BtnRes = t_btn_omake_lsp mov %scenario_Number,5 mov %omake,1 : goto *umi_start
	if %BtnRes = t_btn_omake_end_lsp gosub *omake_sub_menu_end
	; Show the op only after ep1 prologue ;Original Edited - commented, do not show OP in the main menu - W_CUSTOM
	;if %BtnRes = -5 && %UMINEKOEND > 0 goto *show_opening
	;if %BtnRes = -5 && $flag_scenario_1_op == "●" goto *show_opening
	;End Custom
	goto *b_title_button_loop

;Original Edited - Switch Game - W_CUSTOM
;*switch_game ;Played the laughing sound during transition, non needed anymore
	;chvol 0,%dlg_vol
	;dwave 0,"sound\voice\27\50700008.ogg" 

*switch_game_q
	csp_rst ;Non ingame reset call that will remove all the sprites. As an additional feature it ensures that you have cursor icons ready.

	;bg black,0 ;Not needed
	;print 18,50,msk_down ;":c;graphics\system\fade\down.png" ;Not Needed

	;waitvoice 1 ;There is no more transition voice

	;Only version checks inside methods are going to stand, those in definitions must be suppresed
	;mov %title_skip,1 ;Removing this create the menu transition effect
	if %CHIRU_MODE == 0 mov %CHIRU_MODE,1 : jumpf
	if %CHIRU_MODE == 1 mov %CHIRU_MODE,0 : jumpf
	~

	;This in fact reastarts the application, but now it is all in one
	;definereset ;Total reset of the script, restarting from *define (used in order to read the new status of %CHIRU variables)
	goto *b_title ;Necessary to prevent following code execution (show opening), this is an alternative to definereset
	;goto *quick_reload ;same as *b_title but with black screen (probabily also more trustable)
;End Custom

*switch_game_to_extra
	csp_rst 

	mov %saved_last_menu,%CHIRU_MODE

	mov %CHIRU_MODE,2

	goto *b_title 

*switch_game_to_normal
	csp_rst 

	mov %CHIRU_MODE,%saved_last_menu

	goto *b_title 

;End Custom

*show_opening
	if %CHIRU_MODE == 0 mov $Free1,"op" : goto *show_opening_do
	
	;OP level
	mov %Free1,0
	if %UMINEKOEND > 50           mov %Free1,1 ;56
	if $flag_scenario_5_op == "●" mov %Free1,1 ;56
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 70          mov %Free1,2 ;78

	if %Free1 != 0 jumpf
		mov $Free1,"op4"
	~
	if %Free1 != 1 jumpf
		if %current_op == 0 mov $Free1,"op56"
		if %current_op == 1 mov $Free1,"op4"
		inc %current_op
		if %current_op = 2 mov %current_op,0
	~
	if %Free1 != 2 jumpf
		if %current_op == 0 mov $Free1,"op78"
		if %current_op == 1 mov $Free1,"op4"
		if %current_op == 2 mov $Free1,"op56"
		inc %current_op
		if %current_op = 3 mov %current_op,0
	~	

*show_opening_do
	csp_rst
	bg black,0
	vol_mix_fade 1000
	flush 2
	wait 500
	mov %anim_mode,off
	pam 100,$Free1,1
	if %anim_mode == on flush 23 ;trapped
	if %anim_mode == off flush 1

	mov %title_skip,1
	goto *b_title

*title_loading

	clear_cache_img 0 ;main cache

		lsp 4,loading_progres,1170,898
		print 1

		lsph t_txt_bg_lsp,btn_desc_bg,100,470 ;Text generator - btn descriptors common bg - W_CUSTOM

		;Description texts
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 0 write_special_text t_txt_ep1_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep1_btn_desc_t,ep1_btn_desc_s,""
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 0 write_special_text t_txt_ep2_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep2_btn_desc_t,ep2_btn_desc_s,""
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 0 write_special_text t_txt_ep3_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep3_btn_desc_t,ep3_btn_desc_s,""
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 0 write_special_text t_txt_ep4_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep4_btn_desc_t,ep4_btn_desc_s,""
		
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 write_special_text t_txt_ep5_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep5_btn_desc_t,ep5_btn_desc_s,""
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 write_special_text t_txt_ep6_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep6_btn_desc_t,ep6_btn_desc_s,""
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 write_special_text t_txt_ep7_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep7_btn_desc_t,ep7_btn_desc_s,""
		if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 write_special_text t_txt_ep8_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep8_btn_desc_t,ep8_btn_desc_s,""
		
		;Discord - W_CUSTOM
		;(const char* details, const char* currentState, const char* largeImageKey, const char* largeImageText, const char* smallImageKey, const char* smallImageText, const char* startTimestamp, const char* endTimestamp = NULL)
		if %CHIRU_MODE == 0 && $USE_DISCORD == "noval" discordrpc "Rondo of the Witch and Reasoning", "~In title screen", "bea-bg", "Reading Umineko no Naku Koro ni", "butterfly", "Powered by Umineko Project", $ds_Free1
		if %CHIRU_MODE == 1 && $USE_DISCORD == "noval" discordrpc "Nocturne of Truth and Illusions", "~In title screen", "bat-bg", "Reading Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru", "butterfly", "Powered by Umineko Project", $ds_Free1
		if %CHIRU_MODE == 2 && $USE_DISCORD == "noval" discordrpc "Symphony of Catbox and Dreams", "~In title screen", "concerto-logo-ds", "Reading Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku", "butterfly", "Powered by Umineko Project", $ds_Free1
		;End Custom
	
		;lsph t_txt_start_lsp,btn_desc_bg,100,470
		;Original Edited ;Text generator - removed old btn descriptors, add generators - W_CUSTOM

		write_special_text t_txt_ep1_4_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep1_4_btn_desc_t,ep1_4_btn_desc_s,"" 
		write_special_text t_txt_ep5_8_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ep5_8_btn_desc_t,ep5_8_btn_desc_s,"" 

		write_special_text t_txt_load_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,load_btn_desc_t,load_btn_desc_s,"" 

		write_special_text t_txt_lock_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,warn_btn_desc_t,warn_btn_desc_s,"" 
		write_special_text t_txt_unlock_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,unlock_btn_desc_t,unlock_btn_desc_s,"" 
				

		write_special_text t_txt_start_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,start_btn_desc_t,start_btn_desc_s,""

		write_special_text t_txt_web_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,web_btn_desc_t,web_btn_desc_s,"" 
		
		write_special_text t_txt_tea_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,tea_btn_desc_t,tea_btn_desc_s,"" 

		write_special_text t_txt_ura_tea_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,ura_btn_desc_t,ura_btn_desc_s,""

		write_special_text t_txt_chars_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,char_btn_desc_t,char_btn_desc_s,""

		write_special_text t_txt_tips_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,tips_btn_desc_t,tips_btn_desc_s,"" 

		write_special_text t_txt_config_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,cfg_btn_desc_t,cfg_btn_desc_s,"" 

		write_special_text t_txt_cg_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,cg_btn_desc_t,cg_btn_desc_s,"" 

		write_special_text t_txt_music_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,bgm_btn_desc_t,bgm_btn_desc_s,"" 

		write_special_text t_txt_exit_lsp,"title_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,exit_btn_desc_t,exit_btn_desc_s,""

		;End Custom

		if %enable_cache == 0 goto *skip_load_ru

		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\wnd\msgwnd0.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\wnd\msgwnd1.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\wnd\msgwnd2.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\wnd\msgwnd3.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\wnd\msgwnd4.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\wnd\msgwnd4_bg.png"

		;Original Edited ;Text Generator - cached the new buttons - W_CUSTOM
		cache_img 0,r_btn_1_cache
		cache_img 0,r_btn_2_cache
		cache_img 0,r_btn_3_cache
		cache_img 0,r_btn_4_cache
		cache_img 0,r_btn_5_cache
		cache_img 0,r_btn_6_cache
		cache_img 0,r_btn_7_cache
		cache_img 0,r_btn_8_cache
		;End Custom

		lsph 5,cache_chars1,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars2,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars3,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars4,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars5,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars6,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars7,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars8,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars9,0,0 : _csp 5
		lsph 5,cache_chars10,0,0 : _csp 5
	*skip_load_ru

	if %enable_cache == 0 jumpf

		cache_img 0,"graphics\colour\black.png"
		
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\1.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\2.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\c.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\down.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\kanon_r.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\left.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\m1.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\right.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\up.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\fade\x.png"

		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\skip.png"
		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\automode.png"

		cache_img 0,"graphics\system\btns\black_buttons.png"

	~
	
	_csp 4
return

;------------------------------
;Sub-menu after pressing the Start
*start_sub_menu
	btndef ""

	if %block_unlocking = 0 seplay 1,51,70
	;if %block_unlocking = 1 lsph t_btn_start_lsp,title_btn_1,1325,424 : write_special_text gen_txt_11,"title_btn_txt",1325,424,title_start_txt
	;if %block_unlocking = 1 vsp t_hane_lsp,1 : vsp t_logo_lsp,1 : vsp t_btn_start_lsp,1 : vsp_special gen_txt_11,1 : print 1
	 ;Original Edited - lowered bell sound volume from 100 - W_CUSTOM
	;To erase any button other than the start, to place the button ep1 start small, of the load.
	;to place the button, Unlock ep2 (Note: The branch in a clear state)
	;Display the Unlock button and a clear state EP2 UMINEKOEND not <20, does not blink
	;To view the EP2 clear, and may blink UMINEKOEND> = 20 EP1.

	vsp t_btn_web_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_12,0
	vsp t_btn_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_13,0
	vsp t_btn_tips_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_14,0
	vsp t_btn_exit_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_15,0
	vsp t_btn_music_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_16,0
	vsp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_17,0
	vsp t_chars_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_18,0
	vsp t_cg_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_19,0
	vsp t_config_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_20,0
	vsp t_trophy_lsp,0

	print 1

	;start chiru subs_menu
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 goto *start_sub_menu_500
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 2 goto *start_sub_menu_extra_stories
	
   ;An episode, not a clear state
   ;------------------------------
	*start_sub_menu_100
	notif %UMINEKOEND < 20 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_100
	
		if %omake = 1 goto *omake_sub_menu_ep

		lsp t_btn_ep1_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488
		write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep2_lsp,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,548
		write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep3_lsp,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,608
		write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep4_lsp,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,668
		write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""

		lsp t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,728
		write_special_text gen_txt_5,"ep_set_change",1581,728,eps_txt,ep5_n_txt,ep8_n_txt

		lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep_unlock,1430+72,548
		lsp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep_unlock,1430+72,608
		lsp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep_unlock,1430+72,668
		lsp t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep_unlock,1430+72,728

		lsp t_btn_load_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,788	
		write_special_text gen_txt_6,"ep",1562+19,788+3,load_btn_txt

		;Original Edited ;Text Generator - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 11 || %UMINEKOEND = 11 lsp t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep",1562+19,488+3,tea_title_btn_txt
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 12 || %UMINEKOEND = 12 lsp t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep",1562+19,488+3,ura_title_btn_txt
		;End Custom

		print 85

		*start_sub_menu_btn_100_loop
		btndef ""
		
		exbtn_d "P157,1C122-125C139-149C161C163C165" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep1_lsp,"P165P125"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 11 || %UMINEKOEND = 11 exbtn t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,"P165P146"
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 12 || %UMINEKOEND = 12 exbtn t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,"P165P141"
		;End Custom

		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,1 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_1
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,1 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_1
		;End Custom

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %scenario_Number,1 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_100_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_100_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_100_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_100_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep2_unlock ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep3_unlock ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep4_unlock ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep5_8_unlock ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment

		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_100_loop

		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		;Original Edited - remade the whole unlocking process - W_CUSTOM
		*ep2_unlock
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt

			lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
			
			;Button processing
			*ep2_unlock_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep2_unlock_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,20
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,20
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 400 : seplay 9,1001,100
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,21
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep2_unlock_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep2_unlock_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_100
			*ep2_unlock_200
		goto *ep2_unlock_loop


		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		*ep3_unlock
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt	

			lsp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,608 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
				
			;Button processing
			*ep3_unlock_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep3_unlock_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,30
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,30
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 800 : seplay 9,1001,100 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1 : flush 1 : wait 690
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,31
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep3_unlock_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep3_unlock_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_100
			*ep3_unlock_200
		goto *ep3_unlock_loop


		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		*ep4_unlock
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt	

			lsp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,668 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
			
			;Button processing
			*ep4_unlock_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep4_unlock_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,40
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,40
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,0
				lsp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,608 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 800 : seplay 9,1001,100 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,1 : flush 1 : wait 690
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,41
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title

			*ep4_unlock_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep4_unlock_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_100
			*ep4_unlock_200
		goto *ep4_unlock_loop
		
		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		*ep5_8_unlock
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt	

			lsp t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,728 : cell t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24

			*ep5_8_unlock_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep5_8_unlock_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,50
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,50
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp

				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,0
				lsp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,608 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,0
				lsp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,668 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 800 : seplay 9,1001,100 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,1 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,1 : flush 1 : wait 690
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,51
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep5_8_unlock_100

				_csp unlock_bg_lsp

				csp_text gen_txt_10

			*ep5_8_unlock_200
		goto *ep5_8_unlock_loop

	;End Custom - remade all the unlocking processes

   ;Not clear a clear state 2 episode, episode

		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_200_loop
