		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 30 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 30 wait 800 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,1 : seplay 9,1001,100 : wait 270
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 30 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 30 aspt breakupdir,t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,0 : flush 1 : aspt breakup,t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,1000,3500 : wait 1800
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 30 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 30 aspt alpha,t_btn_ep3_lsp,255,600 : sptwait alpha,t_btn_ep3_lsp
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 30 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 30 _csp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp : _csp s0_9
		mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,31
		;End Custom

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 31 || %UMINEKOEND = 31 lsp t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep",1562+19,608+3,tea_title_btn_txt
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 32 || %UMINEKOEND = 32 lsp t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep",1562+19,608+3,ura_title_btn_txt
		;End Custom

		print 85

		*start_sub_menu_btn_300_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P157,1C122-125C139-149C161C163C165" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep1_lsp,"P165P125"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P124"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lsp,"P165P123"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 31 || %UMINEKOEND = 31 exbtn t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,"P165P146"
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 32 || %UMINEKOEND = 32 exbtn t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,"P165P141"
		;End Custom

		;Animations - end of a block-unlcok animation - W_CUSTOM
		if %block_unlocking = 1 lsp 0,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : screenflip 1 : _csp 0 : _csp 5 : print 92 : mov %block_unlocking,0

		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,3 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_3
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,3 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_3
		;End Custom

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %scenario_Number,1 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp mov %scenario_Number,2 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lsp mov %scenario_Number,3 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_300_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_300_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : goto *ep4_unlock_3 ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : goto *ep5_8_unlock_3 ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_300_loop

		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		;Original Edited - remade the whole unlocking process - W_CUSTOM
		*ep4_unlock_3
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt	

			lsp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,668 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
			
			;Button processing
			*ep4_unlock_3_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep4_unlock_2_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,40
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,40
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 400 : seplay 9,1001,100
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,41
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title

			*ep4_unlock_3_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep4_unlock_3_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_300
			*ep4_unlock_3_200
		goto *ep4_unlock_3_loop
		
		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		*ep5_8_unlock_3
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt	

			lsp t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,728 : cell t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
			
			;Button processing
			*ep5_8_unlock_3_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep5_8_unlock_3_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,50
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,50
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,668 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 800 : seplay 9,1001,100 cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,1 : flush 1 : wait 690
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,51
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep5_8_unlock_3_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep5_8_unlock_3_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_300
			*ep5_8_unlock_3_200
		goto *ep5_8_unlock_3_loop
	*start_sub_menu_btn_300
	;End Custom - remade all the unlocking processes

   ;------------------------------
   ;Clear state episode 3
	*start_sub_menu_400
	notif %UMINEKOEND >= 40 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_400
	notif %UMINEKOEND < 50 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_400
	
		if %omake = 1 goto *omake_sub_menu_ep
	
		lsp t_btn_ep1_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488
		write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep2_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548
		write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep3_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608
		write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep4_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,668
		;Animations - sprites to load without unlocking animation - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 41 lsp t_btn_ep4_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,668
		write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""

		lsp t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,728
		write_special_text gen_txt_5,"ep_set_change",1581,728,eps_txt,ep5_n_txt,ep8_n_txt

		lsp t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep_unlock,1430+72,728

		lsp t_btn_load_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,788	
		write_special_text gen_txt_6,"ep",1562+19,788+3,load_btn_txt
		
		;Animations - preparing fake ep blocked buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 40 lsp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,668 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,0
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 40 lsp s0_9,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,668
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 40 lsp t_btn_ep4_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,668 : aspt alpha,t_btn_ep4_lsp,0 : flush 1
		;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 40 wait 800 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,1 : seplay 9,1001,100 : wait 270
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 40 aspt breakupdir,t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,0 : flush 1 : aspt breakup,t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,1000,3500 : wait 1800
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 40 aspt alpha,t_btn_ep4_lsp,255,600 : sptwait alpha,t_btn_ep4_lsp
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 40 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 40 _csp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp : _csp s0_9
		mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,41
		;End Custom

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 41 || %UMINEKOEND = 41 lsp t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep",1562+19,668+3,tea_title_btn_txt
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 42 || %UMINEKOEND = 42 lsp t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep",1562+19,669+3,ura_title_btn_txt
		;End Custom

		print 85

		*start_sub_menu_btn_400_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P157,1C122-125C139-149C161C163C165" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep1_lsp,"P165P125"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P124"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lsp,"P165P123"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lsp,"P165P122"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 41 || %UMINEKOEND = 41 exbtn t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp,"P165P146"
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 42 || %UMINEKOEND = 42 exbtn t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,"P165P141"
		;End Custom

		;Animations - end of a block-unlcok animation - W_CUSTOM
		if %block_unlocking = 1 lsp 0,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : screenflip 1 : _csp 0 : _csp 5 : print 92 : mov %block_unlocking,0

		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,4 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_4
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,4 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_4
		;End Custom

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %scenario_Number,1 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp mov %scenario_Number,2 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lsp mov %scenario_Number,3 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lsp mov %scenario_Number,4 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_400_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : goto *ep5_8_unlock_4 ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_400_loop
		
		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		;Original Edited - remade the whole unlocking process - W_CUSTOM
		*ep5_8_unlock_4
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt	

			lsp t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,728 : cell t_btn_ep5_8_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
			
			;Button processing
			*ep5_8_unlock_4_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep5_8_unlock_4_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,50
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,50
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 400 : seplay 9,1001,100
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,51
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep5_8_unlock_4_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep5_8_unlock_4_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp

				csp_text gen_txt_10

		;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM

		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P124"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lsp,"P165P123"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lsp,"P165P122"

		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		if %block_unlocking = 1 lsp 0,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : screenflip 1 : _csp 0 : _csp 5 : print 92 : mov %block_unlocking,0

		btnwait2 %BtnRes

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %scenario_Number,1 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp mov %scenario_Number,2 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lsp mov %scenario_Number,3 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lsp mov %scenario_Number,4 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp : goto *switch_game_q ;Previously without _q
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_450_loop
		
	*start_sub_menu_btn_450
;------------------------------


*start_sub_menu_500
	notif %UMINEKOEND < 60 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_500

		if %omake = 1 goto *omake_sub_menu_ep
	
		lsp t_btn_ep1_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488

		write_special_text gen_txt_6,"ep",1562+19,788+3,load_btn_txt

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 51 || %UMINEKOEND = 51 lsp t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep",1562+19,488+3,tea_title_btn_txt
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 52 || %UMINEKOEND = 52 lsp t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep",1562+19,488+3,ura_title_btn_txt
		;End Custom

		print 85

		*start_sub_menu_btn_500_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P157,1C133-137C139-149C161C163C165" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep1_lsp,"P165P137"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,"P165P133"
		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 51 || %UMINEKOEND = 51 exbtn t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,"P165P146"
		;??? Temp Buttons

		;End Custom

		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,5 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_5
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,5 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_5
		;End Custom

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %scenario_Number,5 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_500_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_500_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_500_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep6_unlock ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep7_unlock ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep8_unlock ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp : goto *switch_game_q ;Previously without _q

		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_500_loop

		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		;Original Edited - remade the whole unlocking process - W_CUSTOM
		*ep6_unlock
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt

			lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
			
			;Button processing
			*ep6_unlock_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep6_unlock_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,60
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,60
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 400 : seplay 9,1001,100
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,61
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep6_unlock_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep6_unlock_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_500
			*ep6_unlock_200
		goto *ep6_unlock_loop


		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		*ep7_unlock
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt

			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp

			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep7_unlock_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				seplay 3,1001,100
				mov %UMINEKOEND,70
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,70
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,548 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 800 : seplay 9,1001,100 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1 : flush 1 : wait 690
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,71
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep7_unlock_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep7_unlock_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_500
			*ep7_unlock_200
		goto *ep7_unlock_loop


		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		*ep8_unlock
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt

			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep8_unlock_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,80
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,80
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp

				csp_text gen_txt_10

				lsp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,608 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 800 : seplay 9,1001,100 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,1 : flush 1 : wait 690
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,81
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1

				goto *b_title

		goto *ep8_unlock_loop
	*start_sub_menu_btn_500

*start_sub_menu_600
	;notif %UMINEKOEND >= 60 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_600

	if %UMINEKOEND >= 70 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_600

		write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep6_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep3_lsp,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,608

		write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep8_n_txt,""

		;Animations - preparing fake ep blocked buttons - W_CUSTOM

		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 60 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 60 lsp s0_9,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,548
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 60 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 60 lsp t_btn_ep2_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,548 : aspt alpha,t_btn_ep2_lsp,0 : flush 1
		;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 60 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 60 wait 800 : cell t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1 : seplay 9,1001,100 : wait 270
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 60 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 60 aspt breakupdir,t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,0 : flush 1 : aspt breakup,t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,1000,3500 : wait 1800
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 60 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 60 aspt alpha,t_btn_ep2_lsp,255,600 : sptwait alpha,t_btn_ep2_lsp
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 60 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 60 _csp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp : _csp s0_9
		mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,61
		;End Custom
				
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 61 || %UMINEKOEND = 61 lsp t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep",1562+19,548+3,tea_title_btn_txt
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 62 || %UMINEKOEND = 62 lsp t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep",1562+19,548+3,ura_title_btn_txt
		;End Custom

		print 85
		
		*start_sub_menu_btn_600_loop
		btndef ""
		
		exbtn_d "P157,1C133-137C139-149C161C163C165" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P136"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lsp,"P165P140"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,"P165P139"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,"P165P133"
		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 61 || %UMINEKOEND = 61 exbtn t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp,"P165P146"
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 62 || %UMINEKOEND = 62 exbtn t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,"P165P141"
		;End Custom

		;Animations - end of a block-unlcok animation - W_CUSTOM
		if %block_unlocking = 1 lsp 0,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : screenflip 1 : _csp 0 : _csp 5 : print 92 : mov %block_unlocking,0

		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,6 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_6
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,6 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_6
		;End Custom

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %scenario_Number,5 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp mov %scenario_Number,6 : goto *umi_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_600_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,5,100 : goto *start_sub_menu_btn_600_loop ;Button to make a sound processing was run over by
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep7_unlock_2 ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp btndef "" : seplay 9,31,100 : goto *ep8_unlock_2 ;Out to unlock a confirmation message.
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp : goto *switch_game_q ;Previously without _q
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_600_loop

		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		;Original Edited - remade the whole unlocking process - W_CUSTOM
		*ep7_unlock_2
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt

			print 24
				
			;Button processing
			*ep7_unlock_2_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep7_unlock_2_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				seplay 3,1001,100
				mov %UMINEKOEND,70
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,70
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 400 : seplay 9,1001,100
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,71
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep7_unlock_2_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep7_unlock_2_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_600
			*ep7_unlock_2_200
		goto *ep7_unlock_2_loop


		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		*ep8_unlock_2
			vol_se 1,0,1900
			lsp unlock_bg_lsp,unlock_bg,750,400
			lsp unlock_yes_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,494
			write_special_text gen_txt_9,"left",789+19,494+3,yes_btn_txt
			lsp unlock_no_lsp,l_ep_btn_bg,789,566			
			write_special_text gen_txt_10,"left",789+19,566+3,no_btn_txt	

			lsp t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,668 : cell t_btn_ep4_unlock_lsp,1

			print 24
			
			;Button processing
			*ep8_unlock_2_loop
			btndef ""
			spbtn unlock_yes_lsp,unlock_yes_lsp
			spbtn unlock_no_lsp,unlock_no_lsp
			btnwait2 %BtnRes   ;%bm_p
			
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_yes_lsp goto *ep8_unlock_2_100
				;One state to clear the episode.
				mov %UMINEKOEND,80
				mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,80
				gosub *do_unlock
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				print 1
				;Animations - resetting locks cell - W_CUSTOM
				lsp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,unlock_btn_anim,1430+72,608 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,0
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 800 : seplay 9,1001,100 : cell t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp,1 : flush 1 : wait 690
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,81
				;End Custom
				
				E_A
				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000
				bg black,8
				set_window_simple 150,100
				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1
				E_A
				goto *b_title
			*ep8_unlock_2_100
				
			notif %BtnRes = unlock_no_lsp notif %BtnRes = -1 goto *ep8_unlock_2_200
				_csp unlock_bg_lsp
				_csp unlock_yes_lsp
				_csp unlock_no_lsp
				csp_text gen_txt_9
				csp_text gen_txt_10
				btndef ""
				seplay 9,1001,100
				print 1
				goto *start_sub_menu_600
			*ep8_unlock_2_200
		goto *ep8_unlock_2_loop
	*start_sub_menu_btn_600
	;End Custom - remade all the unlocking processes

   ;------------------------------
   ;Clear two-state episode
	*start_sub_menu_700
	;notif %UMINEKOEND >= 70 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_700
	;notif %UMINEKOEND < 80 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_700
	if %UMINEKOEND < 70 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_700
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 80 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_700
	
		if %omake = 1 goto *omake_sub_menu_ep

		write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep6_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep3_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608
		;Animations - sprites to load without unlocking animation - W_CUSTOM

		write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep7_n_txt,""
		lsp t_btn_ep4_lsp,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,668
		write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep8_n_txt,""

		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 70 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 70 lsp s0_9,ep_btn_bg_black,1562,608
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 70 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 70 lsp t_btn_ep3_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,608 : aspt alpha,t_btn_ep3_lsp,0 : flush 1
		;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM

		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 70 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 70 aspt alpha,t_btn_ep3_lsp,255,600 : sptwait alpha,t_btn_ep3_lsp
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 70 if %UNLOCK_PROGRESS = 70 _csp t_btn_ep3_unlock_lsp : _csp s0_9
		mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,71
		;End Custom
		
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 71 || %UMINEKOEND = 71 lsp t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep",1562+19,608+3,tea_title_btn_txt
		;??? Temp Buttons
		if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 72 || %UMINEKOEND = 72 lsp t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep",1562+19,608+3,ura_title_btn_txt
		;End Custom

		print 85

		;End Custom

		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		
		;Original Edited - Tea Party Temp Buttons - W_CUSTOM
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,7 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_7
		;??? Temp Buttons

		;End Custom

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp mov %scenario_Number,6 : goto *umi_start

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_700_loop

		;Check out the message, unlock processing
		;Check out the message, unlock processing

			vol_se 1,0,1900

				;One state to clear the episode.

				csp_text gen_txt_10

				print 1
				;Animations - Executing Unlock Animations - W_CUSTOM
				wait 400 : seplay 9,1001,100
				mov %UNLOCK_PROGRESS,81
				;End Custom

				csp_rst
				bg black,8
				seplay 1,25,100
				bg_d "c:locale_lan","text006",22
				delay 6000

				setwindow5 ":a;graphics\system\empty.png"
				print 1
				screenflip 0
				mov %block_unlocking,1

				goto *b_title

   ;Clear state episode 3

		write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_extra",1562,548+3,r_click_extra1_4+"{n}"

		lsp t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1269,608
		write_special_text gen_txt_5,"ep_extra",1269,608+3,r_click_extra1_5+"{n}"
		lsp t_btn_ep1_lock_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608
		write_special_text gen_txt_6,"ep_extra",1562,608+3,r_click_extra1_6+"{n}"

		lsp t_btn_ep2_lock_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1269,668
		write_special_text gen_txt_7,"ep_extra",1269,668+3,r_click_extra1_7+"{n}"
		lsp t_btn_ep3_lock_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,668
		write_special_text gen_txt_8,"ep_extra",1562,668+3,r_click_extra1_8+"{n}"

		lsp t_btn_ep4_lock_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1269,728
		write_special_text gen_txt_9,"ep_extra",1269,728+3,r_click_extra1_9+"{n}"
		lsp t_btn_ep1_unlock_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,728
		write_special_text gen_txt_10,"ep_extra",1562,728+3,r_click_extra1_10+"{n}"

		lsp t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1269,788
		write_special_text gen_txt_23,"ep_extra",1269,788+3,r_click_extra1_11+"{n}"
		lsp t_btn_load_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,788
		write_special_text gen_txt_24,"ep",1581,788+3,load_btn_txt

		print 85

		*start_sub_menu_btn_extra_stories_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P157,1C107-113C122-125C133-137C139-149C161C163C165" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep1_lsp,"P165P125"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P124"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lsp,"P165P123"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lsp,"P165P122"
		exbtn t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,t_btn_ep5_8_lsp,"P165P113"
		exbtn t_btn_ep1_lock_lsp,t_btn_ep1_lock_lsp,"P165P112"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lock_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lock_lsp,"P165P111"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lock_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lock_lsp,"P165P110"
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_lock_lsp,t_btn_ep4_lock_lsp,"P165P109"
		exbtn t_btn_ep1_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep1_unlock_lsp,"P165P108"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp,"P165P107"

		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		btnwait2 %BtnRes

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,11 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,12 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,13 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,14 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,15 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,16 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,17 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,18 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,19 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_unlock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,110 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,111 : goto *umiextra_start
		
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 :goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_extra_stories_loop
	*start_sub_menu_btn_extra_stories_loop_end

;End Custom - Long

;------------------------------
;Sub-menu after pressing the Tea Party
*tea_sub_menu
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 goto *tea_sub_menu_chiru
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 2 goto *start_sub_menu_extra_extra

	btndef ""

	;Turn off the button other than the tea party, tea party button to display per episode
	;Note to clear the flag, go to view at least ep2 ep1, 3 in more than one.

	vsp t_btn_start_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_11,0
	vsp t_btn_web_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_12,0
	;vsp t_btn_tea_lsp,0
	vsp t_btn_tips_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_14,0
	vsp t_btn_exit_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_15,0
	vsp t_btn_music_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_16,0
	vsp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_17,0
	vsp t_chars_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_18,0
	vsp t_cg_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_19,0
	vsp t_config_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_20,0
	vsp t_trophy_lsp,0
	
	seplay 1,51,100
	print 1

	wait 100

	;Shift on the Tea Party button.
	resettimer
	msp t_btn_tea_lsp,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_13,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_13+1,0,-32,-100 	: print 1 : waittimer 50
	msp t_btn_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_13,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_13+1,0,-32,0 	: print 1 : waittimer 100
	msp t_btn_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_13,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_13+1,0,-32,0 	: print 1 : waittimer 150
	msp t_btn_tea_lsp,0,-32,100	 : msp gen_txt_13,0,-32,100 : msp gen_txt_13+1,0,-32,100 	: print 1	
	seplay 9,1001,100

	*tea_sub_menu_100

	;Original Edited - Removed the '>=' and the NEW labels - W_CUSTOM
	;Adjust the layer you want to display by a clear state
	if %UMINEKOEND > 11 lsp t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 21 lsp t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 31 lsp t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 41 lsp t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""
	;new
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 11 lsp t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_new,1562,488
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 21 lsp t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep2_new,1562,548
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 31 lsp t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep3_new,1562,608
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 41 lsp t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep4_new,1562,668
	;End Custom
	
	print 85 ;15,10

	*tea_sub_menu_btn_100_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P154,1C141-C147C149C161C163C165C102-105P165P146,1" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp,""

		btnwait2 %BtnRes

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,1 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_1
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,2 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_2
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,3 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_3
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,4 : csp_rst  : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_4
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
goto *tea_sub_menu_btn_100_loop

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,6 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *teatime_6

	*start_sub_menu_extra_extra

		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lock_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lock_lsp,"P165P111"
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_lock_lsp,t_btn_ep3_lock_lsp,"P165P110"

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep5_8_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,25 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,26 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,27 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,28 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_lock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,29 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_unlock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,210 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_unlock_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,211 : goto *umiextra_start
		
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 :goto *b_title_moment
		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_extra_extra_loop
	*start_sub_menu_btn_extra_extra_loop_end

~ ;IF %CHIRUMODE != 2

;------------------------------
;Sub-menu after pressing the ura tea party
*ura_tea_sub_menu
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 goto *ura_tea_sub_menu_chiru
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 2 goto *start_sub_menu_extra_final

	btndef ""

	;To erase any button other than the tea party, tea party button to display per episode
	;Note to clear the flag, go to view at least ep2 ep1, 3 in more than one.

	vsp t_btn_start_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_11,0
	vsp t_btn_web_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_12,0
	vsp t_btn_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_13,0
	vsp t_btn_tips_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_15,0
	vsp t_btn_exit_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_16,0
	vsp t_btn_music_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_17,0
	;vsp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0
	vsp t_chars_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_18,0
	vsp t_cg_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_19,0
	vsp t_config_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_20,0
	vsp t_trophy_lsp,0

	seplay 1,51,100
	print 1

	wait 100

	;Shift on the Tea Party button.
	resettimer
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,-100 : print 1 : waittimer 50
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 100
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 150
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 200
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,50	 : print 1 : waittimer 250
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,50	 :print 1	
	seplay 9,1001,100

	*ura_tea_sub_menu_100

	;Original Edited - Removed the '>=' and the NEW labels - W_CUSTOM
	;Adjust the layer you want to display by a clear state
	if %UMINEKOEND > 12 lsp t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 22 lsp t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 32 lsp t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 42 lsp t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""
	;new
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 12 lsp t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_new,1562,488
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 22 lsp t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep2_new,1562,548
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 32 lsp t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep3_new,1562,608
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 42 lsp t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep4_new,1562,668
	;End Custom

	print 85 ;15,10

	*ura_tea_sub_menu_btn_100_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P151,1C142-147C149C161C163C165C82-85P165P141,1" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,""
		btnwait2 %BtnRes

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,1 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_1
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,2 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_2
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,3 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_3
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,4 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_4
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
goto *ura_tea_sub_menu_btn_100_loop

;------------------------------
*ura_tea_sub_menu_chiru
	btndef ""

	;To erase any button other than the tea party, tea party button to display per episode
	;Note to clear the flag, go to view at least ep2 ep1, 3 in more than one.

	vsp t_btn_start_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_11,0
	vsp t_btn_web_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_12,0
	vsp t_btn_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_13,0
	vsp t_btn_tips_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_15,0
	vsp t_btn_exit_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_16,0
	vsp t_btn_music_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_17,0
	;vsp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0
	vsp t_chars_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_18,0
	vsp t_cg_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_19,0
	vsp t_config_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_20,0
	vsp t_trophy_lsp,0

	seplay 1,51,100
	print 1

	wait 100

	;Shift on the Tea Party button.
	resettimer
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,-100 : print 1 : waittimer 50
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 100
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 150
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 200
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,50 : print 1 : waittimer 250
	msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,50 :print 1	
	seplay 9,1001,100

	*ura_tea_sub_menu_100_chiru

	;Original Edited - Removed the '>=' and the NEW labels - W_CUSTOM
	;Adjust the layer you want to display by a clear state
	if %UMINEKOEND > 52 lsp t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep5_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 62 lsp t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep6_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 72 lsp t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep7_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND > 82 lsp t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep8_n_txt,""
	;new
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 52 lsp t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep5_new,1562,488
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 62 lsp t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep6_new,1562,548
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 72 lsp t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep7_new,1562,608
	;if %UMINEKOEND_FLG = 82 lsp t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep8_new,1562,668
	;End Custom

	print 85 ;15,10

	*ura_tea_sub_menu_btn_100_loop_chiru
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P151,1P151,1C142-147C149C161C163C165C82-85P165P141,1" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp,""
		btnwait2 %BtnRes

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,5 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_5
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,6 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_6
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,7 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_7
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_ura_tea_lsp btndef "" : mov %scenario_Number,8 : csp_rst : seplay 9,17,100 : bg white,10 : delay 2000 : set_name_window_non : goto *ura_teatime_8
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
goto *ura_tea_sub_menu_btn_100_loop_chiru
;Saku menu - sub menu (Tsubasa) StoryRelated button loop - W_CUSTOM
if %CHIRU_MODE != 2 jumpf
	*start_sub_menu_extra_final
	if %UMINEKOEND_EXTRA != 99 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_extra_final_loop_end ;TODO DEBUG fix extra stories unlocking
	
		btndef ""

		vsp t_btn_start_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_11,0
		vsp t_btn_web_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_12,0
		vsp t_btn_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_13,0 
		;vsp t_btn_tea_ura_lsp,0
		;vsp t_btn_tips_lsp,0 
		;vsp t_chars_lsp,0
		vsp t_config_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_17,0
		vsp t_cg_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_18,0
		vsp t_btn_music_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_19,0
		vsp t_btn_exit_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_20,0

		vsp t_trophy_lsp,0

		seplay 1,51,100
		print 1

		wait 100

		resettimer
		msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,-100 	: print 1 : waittimer 50
		msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 	: print 1 : waittimer 100
		msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,0 	: print 1 : waittimer 150
		msp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0,-32,100	 : msp gen_txt_14,0,-32,100 : msp gen_txt_14+1,0,-32,100 	: print 1	
		seplay 9,1001,100

		;See ;Sprite numbers in the title screen / for sprite numbers

		;TODO saku button description texts
		;Saku menu - button descriptions - W_CUSTOM

		write_special_text t_txt_ep1_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,extra_3_1_btn_desc_t,extra_3_1_btn_desc_s,""
		write_special_text t_txt_ep2_lsp,"ep_btn_desc",100+42,470+22,extra_3_2_btn_desc_t,extra_3_2_btn_desc_s,""
		;End Custom

		;Text Generator
		lsp t_btn_ep1_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488
		write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,r_click_extra3_1+"{n}"
		lsp t_btn_ep2_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548
		write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,r_click_extra3_2+"{n}"

		lsp t_btn_load_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,788
		write_special_text gen_txt_24,"ep",1581,788+3,load_btn_txt
	
		print 85

		*start_sub_menu_btn_extra_final_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P154,1C107-113C122-125C133-137C139-149C154C161C163C165" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep1_lsp,"P165P125"
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2_lsp,"P165P124"

		exbtn t_btn_load_lsp,t_btn_load_lsp,"P165P148"

		btnwait2 %BtnRes

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,31 : goto *umiextra_start
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_lsp mov %extra_scenario_Number,32 : goto *umiextra_start
		
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_load_lsp btndef "" : _csp t_warning_lsp : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %load_for_title,1 : gosub *loadmode : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 :goto *b_title_moment

		goto *start_sub_menu_btn_extra_final_loop
	*start_sub_menu_btn_extra_final_loop_end

;------------------------------
;Sub-menu after pressing the Tips
*tips_sub_menu
	btndef ""

	vsp t_btn_start_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_11,0
	vsp t_btn_web_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_12,0
	vsp t_btn_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_13,0
	;vsp t_btn_tips_lsp,0
	vsp t_btn_exit_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_14,0
	vsp t_btn_music_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_15,0
	vsp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_17,0
	vsp t_chars_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_18,0
	vsp t_cg_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_19,0
	vsp t_config_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_20,0
	vsp t_trophy_lsp,0

	seplay 8,1001,100
	print 1

	wait 100

	;Shift on the Tips button.
	resettimer
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,-100: msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,-100 : print 1 : waittimer 50
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 100
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 150
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 200
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 250
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 300
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 300
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,0	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,0 : print 1 : waittimer 300
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,50 : print 1 : waittimer 350
	msp t_btn_tips_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_16,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_16+1,0,-32,50 :print 1		
	seplay 9,1001,100
	
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 goto *tips_sub_menu_100_chiru

	*tips_sub_menu_100

	;Adjust the layer you want to display by a clear state
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 20 lsp t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 30 lsp t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 40 lsp t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 50 lsp t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""
	;new
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_FLG = 1 lsp t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_FLG = 2 lsp t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_FLG = 3 lsp t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_FLG = 4 lsp t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""
	
	print 85 ;15,10

	*tips_sub_menu_btn_100_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn_d "P153,1C141-147C149C161C163C165C92-95P165P145,1" ;o: -60

		exbtn t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp,t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp,t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp,""
		exbtn t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,""

		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,1 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,2 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,3 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,4 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
goto *tips_sub_menu_btn_100_loop

	;Adjust the layer you want to display by a clear state
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 60 lsp t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep5_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 70 lsp t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep6_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 80 lsp t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep7_n_txt,""

	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_FLG = 6 lsp t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep6_n_txt,""

;Sub-menu after pressing the Tips
*char_sub_menu
	btndef ""

	vsp t_btn_start_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_11,0
	vsp t_btn_web_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_12,0
	vsp t_btn_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_13,0
	vsp t_btn_tips_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_14,0
	vsp t_btn_exit_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_16,0
	vsp t_btn_music_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_17,0
	vsp t_btn_ura_tea_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_18,0
	;vsp t_chars_lsp,0
	vsp t_cg_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_19,0
	vsp t_config_lsp,0 : vsp_special gen_txt_20,0
	vsp t_trophy_lsp,0

	seplay 8,1001,100
	print 1

	wait 100

	;Shift on the Tips button.
	resettimer
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,-100	 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,-100 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,-100  : print 1 : waittimer 50
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,0		 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,0  : print 1 : waittimer 100
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,0		 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,0  : print 1 : waittimer 150
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,0		 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,0  : print 1 : waittimer 200
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,0		 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,0  : print 1 : waittimer 250
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,0		 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,0 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,0  : print 1 : waittimer 300
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,50  : print 1 : waittimer 350
	msp t_chars_lsp,0,-32,50	 : msp gen_txt_15,0,-32,50 : msp gen_txt_15+1,0,-32,50  :print 1		
	seplay 9,1001,100
	
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 goto *char_sub_menu_100_chiru

	*char_sub_menu_100

	;Adjust the layer you want to display by a clear state
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 20 lsp t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 30 lsp t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 40 lsp t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 50 lsp t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""
	;new
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG = 1 lsp t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,488 : write_special_text gen_txt_1,"ep_w_n",1562+19,488,ep_txt,ep1_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG = 2 lsp t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,548 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"ep_w_n",1562+19,548,ep_txt,ep2_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG = 3 lsp t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,608 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"ep_w_n",1562+19,608,ep_txt,ep3_n_txt,""
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG = 4 lsp t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,ep_btn_bg_new,1562,668 : write_special_text gen_txt_4,"ep_w_n",1562+19,668,ep_txt,ep4_n_txt,""

	print 85 ;15,10

	*char_sub_menu_btn_100_loop
		btndef ""

		exbtn t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,t_btn_ep4_tips_lsp,""
		btnwait2 %BtnRes
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,1 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,0 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep2_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,2 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,0 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep3_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,3 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,0 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title

		if %BtnRes = 0 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -1 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
		if %BtnRes = -10 btndef "" : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_for_title,1 : goto *b_title_moment
goto *char_sub_menu_btn_100_loop

		if %BtnRes = t_btn_ep1_tips_lsp csp_rst : mov %scenario_Number,5 : seplay 9,1001,100 : mov %r_display,0 : mov %r_for_title,1 : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title

*omake_sub_menu
		lsp t_btn_start_lsp,t_btn_start_omake,1325,424
		;lsph t_txt_start_lsp,":a;graphics\menu\title\title1_text_start_omake.png",100,470

		if %CHIRU_MODE = 0 _csp t_txt_start_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep1_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep2_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep3_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep4_lsp
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 _csp t_txt_start_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep5_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep6_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep7_lsp : _csp t_txt_ep8_lsp
	mov %omake,1

*omake_sub_menu_end
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 goto *omake_sub_menu_end_chiru
		lsp t_btn_start_lsp,title_btn_1,1325,424

		lsph t_txt_ep7_lsp,t_txt_ep7,100,470
		lsph t_txt_ep8_lsp,t_txt_ep8,100,470

return

*omake_sub_menu_ep
	if %CHIRU_MODE = 1 goto *omake_sub_menu_ep_chiru

		if %UMINEKOEND > 10 lsp t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep1,1562,488
		if %UMINEKOEND > 20 lsp t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep2,1562,548
		if %UMINEKOEND > 30 lsp t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep3,1562,608
		if %UMINEKOEND > 40 lsp t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep4,1562,668
	
	print 85

	if %UMINEKOEND < 20 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_100_loop
	if %UMINEKOEND < 30 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_200_loop
	if %UMINEKOEND < 40 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_300_loop
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 40 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_400_loop
return

*omake_sub_menu_ep_chiru
		if %UMINEKOEND > 50 lsp t_btn_ep1_lsp,t_btn_ep5,1562,488
		if %UMINEKOEND > 60 lsp t_btn_ep2_lsp,t_btn_ep6,1562,548
		if %UMINEKOEND > 70 lsp t_btn_ep3_lsp,t_btn_ep7,1562,608
		if %UMINEKOEND > 80 lsp t_btn_ep4_lsp,t_btn_ep8,1562,668
	print 85

	if %UMINEKOEND < 60 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_500_loop
	if %UMINEKOEND < 70 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_600_loop
	if %UMINEKOEND < 80 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_700_loop
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 80 goto *start_sub_menu_btn_800_loop
return

*do_unlock_chars8
	if %vv_enj = 0 mov %vv_enj,1
	if %vv_goa = 0 mov %vv_goa,1
*do_unlock_chars7
	if %vv_wil = 0 mov %vv_wil,1
	if %vv_rio = 0 mov %vv_rio,1
	if %vv_cur = 0 mov %vv_cur,1
*do_unlock_chars6
	if %vv_bu3 = 0 mov %vv_bu3,1
	if %vv_fea = 0 || %vv_fe2 = 0 mov %vv_fea,1 : mov %vv_fe2,1
	if %vv_zep = 0 mov %vv_zep,1
	if %vv_fur = 0 mov %vv_fur,1
*do_unlock_chars5
	if %vv_eri = 0 mov %vv_eri,1
	if %vv_dla = 0 mov %vv_dla,1
	if %vv_ger = 0 mov %vv_ger,1
	if %vv_cor = 0 mov %vv_cor,1
*do_unlock_chars4
	if %vv_sak = 0 mov %vv_sak,1
	if %vv_oko = 0 mov %vv_oko,1
	if %vv_kas = 0 mov %vv_kas,1
	if %vv_ama = 0 mov %vv_ama,1

	if %vv_rg5 = 0 mov %vv_rg5,1
	if %vv_rg2 = 0 mov %vv_rg2,1
	if %vv_rg4 = 0 mov %vv_rg4,1
	if %vv_rg1 = 0 mov %vv_rg1,1

	if %vv_wal = 0 mov %vv_wal,1

	if %vv_s45 = 0 mov %vv_s45,1
	if %vv_enj = 0 mov %vv_enj,1
*do_unlock_chars2
	if %vv_goa = 0 mov %vv_goa,1
	if %vv_rg7 = 0 mov %vv_rg7,1
	if %vv_rg3 = 0 mov %vv_rg3,1
	if %vv_rg6 = 0 mov %vv_rg6,1
	if %vv_lam = 0 mov %vv_lam,1
*do_unlock_chars1
	if %vv_nan = 0 mov %vv_nan,1
	if %vv_0 = 0 || %vv_99 = 0 || %vv_98 = 0 || %vv_97 = 0 mov %vv_0,1 : mov %vv_99,1 : mov %vv_98,1 : mov %vv_97,1 : mov %vv_inc,0 ;Original Edited ;Saku voice - %vv_98, %vv_97(english narrator) - W_CUSTOM
	if %vv_kin = 0 || %vv_ki2 = 0 mov %vv_kin,1 : mov %vv_ki2,1
	if %vv_gen = 0 mov %vv_gen,1
	if %vv_but = 0 mov %vv_but,1
	if %vv_geo = 0 mov %vv_geo,1
	if %vv_hid = 0 mov %vv_hid,1
	if %vv_eva = 0 mov %vv_eva,1
	if %vv_kir = 0 mov %vv_kir,1
	if %vv_rud = 0 mov %vv_rud,1
	if %vv_mar = 0 mov %vv_mar,1
	if %vv_ros = 0 mov %vv_ros,1
	if %vv_jes = 0 mov %vv_jes,1
	if %vv_kum = 0 mov %vv_kum,1
	if %vv_goh = 0 mov %vv_goh,1
	if %vv_kan = 0 mov %vv_kan,1
	if %vv_nat = 0 mov %vv_nat,1
	if %vv_sha = 0 mov %vv_sha,1
	if %vv_cla = 0 mov %vv_cla,1
	if %vv_bea = 0 || %vv_be2 = 0 || %vv_be3 = 0 mov %vv_bea,1 : mov %vv_be2,1 : mov %vv_be3,1
	if %vv_ber = 0 mov %vv_ber,1
return

*do_unlock
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 90 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_8_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars8 : return ;unlock ep8
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 80 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_7_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars7 : return ;unlock ep8
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 70 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_6_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars6 : return ;unlock ep7
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 60 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_5_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars5 : return ;unlock ep6
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 50 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_4_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars4 : return ;unlock ep5
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 40 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_3_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars3 : return ;unlock ep4
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 30 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_2_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars2 : return ;unlock ep3
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 20 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*ura_1_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars1 : return ;unlock ep2
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 12 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*teatime_1_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars1 : return ;done tea
	if %UMINEKOEND >= 11 mark_range_read "*umi1_op","*umi1_end" : gosub *do_unlock_chars1 : return ;done ep
return

;><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

;Saku - Custom start for saku stories - W_CUSTOM

*umiextra_start
csp_rst

seplay 9,17,100
bg black,10
E_MA
delay 2000

mov %scenario_Number,0 ;Saku - not starting normal - W_CUSTOM

if %extra_scenario_Number = 11 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_1
if %extra_scenario_Number = 12 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_2
if %extra_scenario_Number = 13 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_3
if %extra_scenario_Number = 14 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_4
if %extra_scenario_Number = 15 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_5
if %extra_scenario_Number = 16 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_6
if %extra_scenario_Number = 17 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_7
if %extra_scenario_Number = 18 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_8
if %extra_scenario_Number = 19 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_9
if %extra_scenario_Number = 110 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_10
if %extra_scenario_Number = 111 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra1_11

if %extra_scenario_Number = 21 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra2_1
if %extra_scenario_Number = 22 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra2_2

if %extra_scenario_Number = 25 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra2_5

if %extra_scenario_Number = 29 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra2_9
if %extra_scenario_Number = 210 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra2_10
if %extra_scenario_Number = 211 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra2_11

if %extra_scenario_Number = 31 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra3_1
if %extra_scenario_Number = 32 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *umiextra3_2


return

;End Custom

*umi_start
csp_rst
if %omake = 1 && %omake_level > 1 jumpf
	seplay 9,17,100
	bg black,10 ;Original Edited - From white to black door opening screen (skip blinding) - W_CUSTOM
	E_MA
	delay 2000
~
if %omake = 0 || %omake_level <= 1 jumpf
	seplay 1,22,71
	bg black,0
	flush 99,2000,"whirl.dll/r"
	E_MA
	delay 2000
~

mov %extra_scenario_Number,0 ;Saku - not starting extra - W_CUSTOM

if %scenario_Number = 1 goto *umi1_standby
if %scenario_Number = 2 goto *umi2_standby
if %scenario_Number = 3 goto *umi3_standby
if %scenario_Number = 4 goto *umi4_standby
;chiru
if %scenario_Number = 5 goto *umi5_standby
if %scenario_Number = 6 goto *umi6_standby
if %scenario_Number = 7 goto *umi7_standby
if %scenario_Number = 8 goto *umi8_standby

;Perhaps, expected to be the scenario selection screen

*umi1_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o1
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 11 || $flag_scenario_1_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi1_op

*umi2_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o2
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 21 || $flag_scenario_2_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi2_op

*umi3_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o3
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 31 || $flag_scenario_3_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi3_op

*umi4_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o4
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 41 || $flag_scenario_4_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi4_op
 
*umi5_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o_chiru
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 51 || $flag_scenario_5_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi5_op

*umi6_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o_chiru
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 61 || $flag_scenario_6_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi6_op

*umi7_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o_chiru
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 71 || $flag_scenario_7_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi7_op

*umi8_standby
 if %omake = 1 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : goto *o_chiru
 if %UMINEKOEND >= 81 || $flag_scenario_8_op == "●" goto *scenario_jump_q
 gosub *jump_sysdata_set1
 goto *umi8_op

;***********************************************************
; Jump to scenario mode
;***********************************************************
*scenario_jump_q

;Use confirmation scenario jump mode

csp_rst
;lsp 703,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0,100
lsp 703,":c;graphics\menu\jump\OpenBookA.png",0,0

;Advance when the magic can be used.
*scenario_jump_q2
mov %x,670
mov %y,480

border_pad_push 5

lsp 501,use_magic1,0,0 ;%y : add %y,55
lsp 503,use_magic2,0,0
lsp 504,use_magic3,0,0

align_message_c 501,503,504

border_pad_pop

*scenario_jump_q3
btndef ""

spbtn 503,503
spbtn 504,504

btnwait %btnRes

if %BtnRes = -1 mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
if %BtnRes = -10 mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
if %btnRes = 503 btndef "" : goto *scenario_jump_name
if %btnRes = 504 btndef "" : goto *scenario_start
goto *scenario_jump_q3

if %scenario_Number = 1 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep1,246+299,278+168,100,100 ;chapter screen

if %scenario_Number = 2 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep2,664,476,175,175,0 ;chapter screen
if %scenario_Number = 3 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep3,664,476,175,175,0 ;chapter screen
if %scenario_Number = 4 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep4,664,476,175,175,0 ;chapter screen
;chiru
if %scenario_Number = 5 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep5,664,476,175,175,0 ;chapter screen
if %scenario_Number = 6 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep6,664,476,175,175,0 ;chapter screen
if %scenario_Number = 7 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep7,664,476,175,175,0 ;chapter screen
if %scenario_Number = 8 lbsp2 610,chapter_screen_all_ep8,664,476,175,175,0 ;chapter screen

;aspt2 blur,610,10
;lsp2 609,":a;graphics\menu\jump\border.png",664,476 ;portrait border -30 надо будет сделать в x для всех
lsp 609,":a;graphics\menu\jump\borderA.png",0,0 ;portrait border -30 надо будет сделать в x для всех
lsp 608,":a;graphics\menu\jump\border2.png",175,646 ;portrait for text left
lsp 607,":a;graphics\menu\jump\border2.png",535,646 ;portrait for text right

display_clock3 545,690,30,6*60,8*60,0,0

;lsp 500,rmenu_btn_please_select_text,%x,100

;Do we display all the jumps regardless of actual completeness?
mov %Free6,0
if %scenario_Number = 1 && %UMINEKOEND > 10 mov %Free6,1
if %scenario_Number = 2 && %UMINEKOEND > 20 mov %Free6,1
if %scenario_Number = 3 && %UMINEKOEND > 30 mov %Free6,1
if %scenario_Number = 4 && %UMINEKOEND > 41 mov %Free6,1
;chiru
if %scenario_Number = 5 && %UMINEKOEND > 50 mov %Free6,1
if %scenario_Number = 6 && %UMINEKOEND > 60 mov %Free6,1
if %scenario_Number = 7 && %UMINEKOEND > 70 mov %Free6,1
if %scenario_Number = 8 && %UMINEKOEND > 81 mov %Free6,1


;Button placement

;for %Free3 = 1 to %Free2
;creates stack overflow when we try to exit the for loop

mov %Free3,0
*scenario_btn_iter
	inc %Free3
	if %Free3 > %Free2 goto *scenario_btn_done

	border_pad_push 5

	;_csp %Free1
	lsp %Free1,":s;#D7D7D7#FFFFFF`{a:c:{p:15:{w:620:}{fit}"+$%Free1+"}}",%x,%y ;chapter
	add %Free1,30
	if $%Free1 != "" lsph %Free1,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:c:{w:300:{fit}{p:14:"+$%Free1+"}}}",860-200,646+12 ;Date Specification - right of clock
	if $%Free1 == "" lsph %Free1,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:c:{w:300:{fit}{p:16:—————————}}}",860-200,646+12-9 ;Date Specification - right of clock

	add %Free1,30
	lsph %Free1,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:c:{w:300:{fit}{p:14:"+$%Free1+"}}}",168,646+12 ;Chapter Number - left of clock

	border_pad_pop

	mov %Free7,%Free1+30

	;Button
	itoa $Free1,%Free1-30
	itoa $Free4,%Free1
	sub %Free1,60
	exbtn %Free1,%Free3,"P"+$Free1+"P"+$Free4+$%Free7 ;+"P604"

	;X values increase
	add %y,44
	inc %Free1

	if %Free6 == 1 goto *scenario_btn_iter
	inc %Free5
	if $%Free5 != "●" goto *scenario_btn_done
goto *scenario_btn_iter

*scenario_btn_done

;Back button
lsp rmenu_btn_Exit,rmenu_btn_Exit_text,%x,990
spbtn rmenu_btn_Exit,rmenu_btn_Exit

;Make black darker
;amsp 703,0,0,140

print 1

*scenario_jump_btnwait
;Wait for clicks

    ;transbtn
	btnwait %btnRes
	
	if %btnRes = rmenu_btn_Exit btndef "" : csp2 -1 : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %btnRes = -1 			btndef "" : csp2 -1 : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %btnRes = -10 			btndef "" : csp2 -1 : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %scenario_Number = 1  goto *scenario_jump_data1
	if %scenario_Number = 2  goto *scenario_jump_data2
	if %scenario_Number = 3  goto *scenario_jump_data3
	if %scenario_Number = 4  goto *scenario_jump_data4
	;chiru
	if %scenario_Number = 5  goto *scenario_jump_data5
	if %scenario_Number = 6  goto *scenario_jump_data6
	if %scenario_Number = 7  goto *scenario_jump_data7
	if %scenario_Number = 8  goto *scenario_jump_data8

goto *scenario_jump_btnwait

*perform_magic_jump
	btndef ""
	bg black,0
	csp2 -1
	csp_rst
	print 22
	wait2 100
	E_A
return

;---------------------------

*jump_sysdata_set1   ;Scenario Settings 1-1 System
	btndef ""
	gosub *textoff2

	csp_rst
	bg black,22
	set_name_window_non
	text_speed %textspeed
	text_fade 133
	mov %flg_number_t,0
	mov %flg_number_o,0
return

	if %BtnRes < 1 goto *scenario_jump_btnwait
	if %BtnRes > 18 goto *scenario_jump_btnwait

	gosub *perform_magic_jump

	skip_off

	if %BtnRes = 1 gosub *scenario_jump_exit_efe1 : gosub *umi1_op_flags : skip_on : goto *umi1_op

	if %BtnRes < 1 goto *scenario_jump_btnwait
	if %BtnRes > 19 goto *scenario_jump_btnwait

	skip_off

	if %BtnRes = 1 gosub *scenario_jump_exit_efe1 : gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : skip_on : goto *umi2_op
	if %BtnRes = 2 gosub *scenario_jump_exit_efe1 : gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : skip_on : goto *umi2_1
	if %BtnRes = 3 gosub *scenario_jump_exit_efe1 : gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : skip_on : goto *umi2_2
	if %BtnRes = 4 gosub *scenario_jump_exit_efe1 : gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : skip_on : goto *umi2_3
	if %BtnRes = 5 gosub *scenario_jump_hiduke_1986_10_4 : gosub *scenario_jump_exit_efe1 : gosub *jump_sysdata_set1 : skip_on : goto *umi2_4
