*msgwnd_non
mov $cur_character,"non"
jnskip_s return ~
if %vv_0 = 0 || %vv_99 = 0 || %vv_98 = 0 || %vv_97 = 0 mov %vv_0,1 : mov %vv_99,1 : mov %vv_98,1 : mov %vv_97,1 : mov %vv_inc,0 ;Original Edited ;Saku voice - %vv_98 , %vv_97(english narrator) - W_CUSTOM
gosub *get_name 0
if %cur_wndmode == off d_name ""
return


;**************************************************
;Custom Subs - W_CUSTOM
;**************************************************
*write_special_text ;Text Generator
	getparam %lsp_slot,$lsp_type,%lsp_x,%lsp_y,$lsp_text1,$lsp_text2,$lsp_text3,%parent_slot

	if $lsp_type != "ep_w_n" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{p:43:"+$lsp_text1+"} {s:-1,0:{p:44:"+$lsp_text2+"}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsp %lsp_slot+1,":s;#000000`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{s:1,2:{p:83:"+$lsp_text1+"} {p:84:"+$lsp_text2+"}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y+1
		spt blur,%lsp_slot+1,300
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "ep" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{p:43:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsp %lsp_slot+1,":s;#000000`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{s:1,2:{p:83:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y+1
		spt blur,%lsp_slot+1,300
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "ep_extra" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{p:43:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsp %lsp_slot+1,":s;#000000`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{s:1,2:{p:83:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y+2
		spt blur,%lsp_slot+1,300
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "ep_set_change" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{p:43:"+$lsp_text1+"} {s:-1,0:{p:44:"+$lsp_text2+"}{p:44:{charspacing:4:-"+$lsp_text3+"}}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsp %lsp_slot+1,":s;#000000`{w:245:{fit:{a:r:{s:1,2:{p:83:"+$lsp_text1+"} {p:84:"+$lsp_text2+"}{p:84:{charspacing:4:-"+$lsp_text3+"}}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y+1
		spt blur,%lsp_slot+1,300
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "left" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:l:{p:43:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsp %lsp_slot+1,":s;#000000`{a:l:{s:1,2:{p:83:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y+1
		spt blur,%lsp_slot+1,300
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "ch_name" jumpf
		split $lsp_text1,"|",$lsp_text1,$lsp_text2,$lsp_text3
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:900:{a:r:{p:46:"+$lsp_text1+"}}  {n}{a:r:{p:46:"+$lsp_text2+"}}  {n}{a:r:{p:46:"+$lsp_text3+"}}  {n}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsp %lsp_slot+1,":s;#000000`{w:900:{a:r:{p:86:"+$lsp_text1+"}}  {n}{a:r:{p:86:"+$lsp_text2+"}}  {n}{a:r:{p:86:"+$lsp_text3+"}}  {n}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		spt blur,%lsp_slot+1,500
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "title_btn_desc" jumpf
		lsph %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:43:{interline:-13:"+$lsp_text1+"}} {interline:20:{n}}{p:47:{interline:-13:"+$lsp_text2+" {n}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "ep_btn_desc" jumpf
		lsph %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:43:{interline:-13:"+$lsp_text1+"}} {interline:20:{n}}{p:48:{interline:-13:"+$lsp_text2+" {n}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "title_btn_txt" jumpf
		lsph %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:504:{fit:{a:r:{p:49:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsph %lsp_slot+1,":s;#000000`{w:504:{fit:{a:r:{p:89:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x+2,%lsp_y+1
		spt blur,%lsp_slot+1,300
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "r_menu_btn" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#B2B2B2`{w:396:{fit:{a:c:{p:50:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsph %lsp_slot-20,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:396:{fit:{a:c:{p:51:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		lsph %lsp_slot-19,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:396:{fit:{a:c:{p:91:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		spt blur,%lsp_slot-19,900
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "config_title" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:c:{p:52:{w:1920:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "config_section" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#181818`{a:c:{p:53:{w:386:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "config_option_name" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:54:"+$lsp_text1+"}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "config_option" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:c:{p:55:{w:350:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "config_option_large" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:c:{p:55:{w:550:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "submenu_btn_title" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#E1E1E1`{a:c:{p:57:{size:37:{w:237:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "cfg_exit_confirm" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{a:c:{p:54:{w:1920:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "slider_index" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#181818`{a:c:{p:56:{w:50:{fit}"+$temp_var+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "in_story_choice" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#E1E1E1`{a:c:{p:57:{w:1169:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "mbox_select_title" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:53:"+$lsp_text1+"}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "bgm_description" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#181818`{p:58:"+$lsp_text1+"}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "char_desc" jumpf
		split $lsp_text1,"|",$char_desc_title,$char_desc_jpn,$char_desc_desc
		if $char_desc_desc == "" mov $char_desc_desc,$char_desc_jpn : lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:3:{interline:-25: {n}}{interline:-6:"+$char_desc_title+" }{interline:-8: {n}}{interline:-5:{n}{n}"+$char_desc_desc+"}{interline:-7: {n}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y : return
	    lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:3:{interline:-25: {n}}{interline:-6:"+$char_desc_title+" {p:4:"+$char_desc_jpn+"} }{interline:-8: {n}}{interline:-5:{n}{n}"+$char_desc_desc+"}{interline:-7: {n}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		if %char_is_selected == 0 aspt xpos,%lsp_slot,-1000
		;aspt alpha,%lsp_slot,0
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "select_char" jumpf
		lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#DDDDDD`{a:c:{p:43:{w:1920:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "char_page_next" jumpf
		if $lsp_text2 != "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:175:{fit:{a:c:{p:59:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		if $lsp_text2 == "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#7F7F7F`{w:175:{fit:{a:c:{p:59:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "char_page_previous" jumpf
		if $lsp_text2 != "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:175:{fit:{a:c:{p:59:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		if $lsp_text2 == "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#7F7F7F`{w:175:{fit:{a:c:{p:59:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "char_action" jumpf
		if $lsp_text2 != "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:239:{fit:{a:c:{p:60:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		if $lsp_text2 == "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#7F7F7F`{w:239:{fit:{a:c:{p:60:"+$lsp_text1+"}{n}}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "char_ep_btn" jumpf
		if $lsp_text2 != "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot-1,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:51:{fit:{a:c:{p:60:{fontsize:24:"+$lsp_text1+"}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x-6,%lsp_y
		if $lsp_text2 == "disabled" lsp %lsp_slot-1,":s;#7F7F7F`{w:51:{fit:{a:c:{p:60:{fontsize:24:"+$lsp_text1+"}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x-6,%lsp_y
		return
	~
	if $lsp_type != "save_ep_btn" jumpf
		if $lsp_text2 != "disabled" lsp2 %lsp_slot,":s;#FFFFFF`{w:51:{fit:{a:c:{p:60:{fontsize:24:"+$lsp_text1+"}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x-6,%lsp_y
		if $lsp_text2 == "disabled" lsp2 %lsp_slot,":s;#7F7F7F`{w:51:{fit:{a:c:{p:60:{fontsize:24:"+$lsp_text1+"}}{n}}}}",%lsp_x-6,%lsp_y
		return
	~

return

*write_slider_text
	getparam %lsp_slot,%lsp_x,%lsp_y,$lsp_text1
	lsp %lsp_slot,":s;#181818`{a:c:{p:56:{w:50:{fit}"+$lsp_text1+"}}}",%lsp_x,%lsp_y
return

*csp_text
getparam %txt_to_csp
	_csp %txt_to_csp
	_csp %txt_to_csp+1
	_csp2 %txt_to_csp
	_csp2 %txt_to_csp+1
return

*vsp_special
getparam %txt_to_csp,%vsp_special_param
	vsp %txt_to_csp,%vsp_special_param
	vsp %txt_to_csp+1,%vsp_special_param
return

*config_write_str
getparam $config_name,$config_value
	operate_config u_write, $config_value, $config_name
	operate_config save
return

*config_write_num
getparam $config_name,%config_value
	itoa $config_value,%config_value
	operate_config u_write, $config_value, $config_name
	operate_config save
return

*search_bg
	getparam $lbg_type,$lbg_name

	if $lbg_type == "backgrounds" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";backgrounds\" + $bg_folder_name + "\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "clock" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\system\clock\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "colour" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\colour\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "efe" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\efe\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "caches" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";caches\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  

	if $lbg_type == "quiz" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\menu\quiz\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  

	;TODO Add variations when bg is not in backgrounds folder for all the following methods ;Localization
	if $lbg_type == "locale_shared" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\shared\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "locale_lan" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "alibi" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\alibi\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "cas" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\cas\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "comment" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\comment\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "dai" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\dai\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "mondai" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\mondai\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "murderer" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\murderer\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "story" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\story\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "text" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\text\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return  
	if $lbg_type == "local_saku" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\localized\"+localisation+"\saku\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return 

	;CGs
	if $lbg_type == "cg" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/bea" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\bea\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/ber" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\ber\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/but" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\but\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/cgbox" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\cg_box\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/dla" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\dla\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/enj" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\enj\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/eri" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\eri\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/ev2" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\ev2\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/eva" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\eva\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/fea" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\fea\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/gap" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\gap\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/geo" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\geo\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/jes" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\jes\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/kan" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\kan\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/kir" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\kir\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/lam" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\lam\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/nat" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\nat\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/ron" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\ron\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/ros" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\ros\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/rud" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\rud\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/s" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\s\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/sak" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\sak\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/sha" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\sha\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/wal" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\wal\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "cg/wil" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\cg\wil\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return

	;Saku
	if $lbg_type == "saku" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\saku\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "tsu1" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\saku\tsu1\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "tsu2" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\saku\tsu2\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "tsu3" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\saku\tsu3\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return
	if $lbg_type == "tsu7" : mov $lbg_path,":"+$paste_method+";graphics\saku\tsu7\" + $lbg_name + ".png" : return

return

*outfit_change
		if %r_side = 0 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][condition],1
		if %r_side = 1 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][condition],1 
		if %r_side = 2 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][condition],1
	
		if %r_for_title != 1 goto *outfit_change_end



		if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 0 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 0 jumpf

			mov %outfit_selector,%r_display_cha
			if $?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][0] == "" goto *outfit_change_end ;If an outfit exists

			;Lower outfit limit (just one)
			if $?outfits[%outfit_selector][1][0] == "" if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou] = 2 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou],1 : goto *outfit_change_end
			
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou] = 1 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou],2 : goto *outfit_change_end
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou] = 2 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou],3 : goto *outfit_change_end

			;Back to original
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou] = 3 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou],1 : goto *outfit_change_end
		~

		if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 1 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 1 jumpf

			mov %outfit_selector,%r_display_cha_ma
			if %r_display_cha_ma = ma3_ev2 mov %outfit_selector,ev2
			if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ev2 mov %outfit_selector,ev2
			if $?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][0] == "" goto *outfit_change_end ;If an outfit exists

			;Lower outfit limit (just one)
			if $?outfits[%outfit_selector][1][0] == "" if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou] = 2 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou],1 : goto *outfit_change_end
			
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou] = 1 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou],2 : goto *outfit_change_end
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou] = 2 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou],3 : goto *outfit_change_end

			;Back to original
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou] = 3 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou],1 : goto *outfit_change_end
		~

		if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 2 jumpf
		if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 2 jumpf

			mov %outfit_selector,%r_display_cha_enj
			if %r_display_cha_enj = enj_enj mov %outfit_selector,enj
			if $?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][0] == "" goto *outfit_change_end ;If an outfit exists

			;Lower outfit limit (just one)
			if $?outfits[%outfit_selector][1][0] == "" if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou] = 2 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou],1 : goto *outfit_change_end

			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou] = 1 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou],2 : goto *outfit_change_end
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou] = 2 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou],3 : goto *outfit_change_end

			;Back to original
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou] = 3 mov ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou],1 : goto *outfit_change_end
		~

		*outfit_change_end

		gosub *r_cha_display
		seplay 9,1001,100
		print 1
return

;W_CUSTOM - ;Outfit
*outfit_change_register
getparam %outfit_change_p_lsp

;debug_var %r_display_cha
if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 0 jumpf
if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 0 jumpf

	mov %outfit_selector,%r_display_cha

		lsp %outfit_change_p_lsp,$?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][condition]],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][itiran_y]
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou] = 2 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][condition] = 1 mov $r_cha_tati_path,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][0] : lsp %outfit_change_p_lsp,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][1],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][itiran_y]
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][r_ishou] = 3 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][condition] = 1 mov $r_cha_tati_path,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][1][0] : lsp %outfit_change_p_lsp,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][1][1],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha][itiran_y]

~

if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 1 jumpf
if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 1 jumpf

	mov %outfit_selector,%r_display_cha_ma
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma3_ev2 mov %outfit_selector,ev2
	if %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_ev2 mov %outfit_selector,ev2 ;This should be added also to the above function

		lsp %outfit_change_p_lsp,$?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][condition]],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][itiran_y]
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][r_ishou] = 2 && ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][condition] = 1 mov $r_cha_tati_path,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][0] : lsp %outfit_change_p_lsp,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][1],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_ma][itiran_y]

~

if %scenario_Number <= 3 if %r_side != 2 jumpf
if %scenario_Number > 3 if %r_display_side != 2 jumpf

	mov %outfit_selector,%r_display_cha_enj
	if %r_display_cha_enj = enj_enj mov %outfit_selector,enj

		lsp %outfit_change_p_lsp,$?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][condition]],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][itiran_y]
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][r_ishou] = 2 mov $r_cha_tati_path,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][0] : lsp %outfit_change_p_lsp,$?outfits[%outfit_selector][0][1],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][itiran_x],?r[%scenario_Number][%r_display_cha_enj][itiran_y]

~

return

;*************************
; lsl loads a standing sprite with lips
;*************************
*lsl
*load_sprite_lips
getparam %lss_slot,$lss_sec,$lss_key,%lips_cell
csp_slot %lss_slot-1

;TODO add lips standing sprite to sprites cache

fileexist %lss_lips,"sprites\" + $sprite_folder_name + "\" + $lss_sec + "\2\" + $lss_sec + "_" + $lss_key + ".png"

if %lss_lips == 0 jumpf
	loadfromreg $lss_temp,$lss_sec,$lss_key + "_x"
	atoi %lss_lips_x,$lss_temp
	loadfromreg $lss_temp,$lss_sec,$lss_key + "_y"
	atoi %lss_lips_y,$lss_temp
	lsp2 %lss_slot-1,":a/4,0,3;sprites\" + $sprite_folder_name + "\" + $lss_sec + "\2\" + $lss_sec + "_" + $lss_key + ".png",%lss_lips_x,%lss_lips_y,100,100,0
	if $lss_sec == "en2" mov $lss_sec,"enj"
	if $lss_sec == "ka2" mov $lss_sec,"kan"
	if $lss_sec == "be2" mov $lss_sec,"bea"
	cell %lss_slot-1,%lips_cell
~

return
;End Custom

;*************************
;Sprite Cache reload
;*************************
*reload_slots
	for %for_index1=0 to 247
	
		mov %reloading_status,0

		;Subset position 0 contains sprite/bg path
		len %string_length,$?slot_cache[%for_index1][0]

		if %string_length > 0 split $?slot_cache[%for_index1][0],"|",$string_temp3,$string_temp2 : split $string_temp3,":",$paste_method,$string_temp1
		if %string_length <= 0 mov $string_temp1,"" : mov $string_temp2, "" : mov $string_temp3, "" : mov $paste_method,"" : mov %aspt_val1,0 : mov %aspt_val2,0 : mov %aspt_val3,0

		;1 - Bg Type
		;2 - Bg Path
		;3 - Original String Value

		;DEBUG
		;debug_str $?slot_cache[%for_index1][0]

		;Strats BGs reload
		;Checks if it is a type of background, is so after reloading it it jumps forward skipping the sprite reload
		if $?slot_cache[%for_index1][0] == "" jumpf
		if $string_temp1 == "backgrounds" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "colour" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "clock" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "efe" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cache" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs

		if $string_temp1 == "quiz" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs

		;Localization
		if $string_temp1 == "locale_shared" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "locale_lan" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "alibi" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cas" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "comment" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "dai" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "mondai" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "murderer" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "story" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "text" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "local_saku" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
	
		;CGs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/bea" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/ber" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/but" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/cg_box" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/dla" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/enj" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/eri" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/ev2" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/eva" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/fea" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/gap" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/geo" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/jes" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/kan" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/kir" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/lam" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/nat" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/ron" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/ros" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/rud" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/s" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/sak" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/sha" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/wal" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "cg/wil" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs

		;Saku
		if $string_temp1 == "saku" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "tsu1" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "tsu2" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "tsu3" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs
		if $string_temp1 == "tsu7" mov %reloading_status,1 : lbg $paste_method+":"+$string_temp1,%for_index1+750,$string_temp2 : goto *apply_edits_to_bgs

		goto *skip_apply_edits_to_bgs
		*apply_edits_to_bgs
		for %for_index2=1 to 26
			if $?slot_cache[%for_index1][%for_index2] != "" split $?slot_cache[%for_index1][%for_index2],"|",$string_temp1,$string_temp2,$string_temp3 : split $string_temp3,"\",%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
				;1-Pos Command / 2-Pos Property / 3-Property Value
				;debug_str $?slot_cache[%for_index1][%for_index2]
			if $string_temp1 == "aspt2" spt_mem "a2",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
			if $string_temp1 == "aspt" spt_mem "a",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
			if $string_temp1 == "spt2" spt_mem "r2",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
			if $string_temp1 == "spt" spt_mem "r",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
		next
		mov %reloading_status,0
		jumpf
		*skip_apply_edits_to_bgs

		;Ends BGs reload

		;DEBUG
		;debug_str "Sprite Cache: " + $?slot_cache[%for_index1][0]

		;Sprites reload
		mov %reloading_status,1
		lss %for_index1+750,$string_temp3,$string_temp2
		for %for_index2=1 to 26
			if $?slot_cache[%for_index1][%for_index2] != "" split $?slot_cache[%for_index1][%for_index2],"|",$string_temp1,$string_temp2,$string_temp3 : split $string_temp3,"\",%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
				;1-Pos Command / 2-Pos Property / 3-Property Value
				;debug_str $?slot_cache[%for_index1][%for_index2]
			if $string_temp1 == "aspt2" spt_mem "a2",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
			if $string_temp1 == "aspt" spt_mem "a",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
			if $string_temp1 == "spt2" spt_mem "r2",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
			if $string_temp1 == "spt" spt_mem "r",$string_temp2,%for_index1+750,%aspt_val1,%aspt_val2,%aspt_val3
		next
		mov %reloading_status,0

		~

	next

return

*empty_slot_cache

	for %for_index4=0 to 247
		;DEBUG
		;itoa $string_temp1,%0
		;debug_str $string_temp1
		for %for_index5=0 to 26
			mov $?slot_cache[%for_index4][%for_index5],""
		next
	next

return

;**************************************************
;End Custom Subs
;**************************************************

*quick_reload
mov %title_skip,1
;This strange line is now thought unnecessary since we clear log in b_title.
;mov %log_is_generated_to_cvs,0
reset

*read_forced_cfg
	operate_config u_read,$autom_no_cur,"automode_hide_cursor"
	if $autom_no_cur == "true" mov %autom_no_cur,on

	operate_config u_read,$UMINEKOEND,"complete_episode"
	if $UMINEKOEND == "undef" jumpf
		if $UMINEKOEND == "1" mov %UMINEKOEND,20 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,20 : gosub *do_unlock
		if $UMINEKOEND == "2" mov %UMINEKOEND,30 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,30 : gosub *do_unlock
		if $UMINEKOEND == "3" mov %UMINEKOEND,40 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,40 : gosub *do_unlock
		if $UMINEKOEND == "4" mov %UMINEKOEND,50 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,50 : gosub *do_unlock
		if $UMINEKOEND == "5" mov %UMINEKOEND,60 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,60 : gosub *do_unlock
		if $UMINEKOEND == "6" mov %UMINEKOEND,70 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,70 : gosub *do_unlock
		if $UMINEKOEND == "7" mov %UMINEKOEND,80 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,80 : gosub *do_unlock
		if $UMINEKOEND == "8" mov %UMINEKOEND,90 : mov %UMINEKOEND_FLG,90 : gosub *do_unlock
	~

	operate_config u_read,$music_box_tmp,"bgm_unlock"
	if $music_box_tmp == "undef" jumpf
		if $music_box_tmp == "8" gosub *load_bgms_8
		if $music_box_tmp == "7" gosub *load_bgms_7
		if $music_box_tmp == "6" gosub *load_bgms_6
		if $music_box_tmp == "5" gosub *load_bgms_5
		if $music_box_tmp == "4" gosub *load_bgms_4
		if $music_box_tmp == "3" gosub *load_bgms_3
		if $music_box_tmp == "2" gosub *load_bgms_2
		if $music_box_tmp == "1" gosub *load_bgms_1
	~

	operate_config u_read,$CHIRU_MODE,"force_game"
	if $CHIRU_MODE == "undef" jumpf
		if $CHIRU_MODE == "rondo" && %CHIRU_MODE != 0 mov %CHIRU_MODE,0 : csp_rst : definereset
		if $CHIRU_MODE == "chiru" && %CHIRU_MODE != 1 mov %CHIRU_MODE,1 : csp_rst : definereset
		if $CHIRU_MODE == "extra" && %CHIRU_MODE != 2 mov %CHIRU_MODE,2 : csp_rst : definereset
	~

	operate_config u_read,$firstsetting,"first_launch"
	if $firstsetting == "undef" jumpf
		if $firstsetting == "passed" mov %firstsetting,1
		if $firstsetting == "force" mov %firstsetting,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$bgm_title_language,"bgm_title_language"
	if $bgm_title_language == "undef" jumpf
		if $bgm_title_language == "English" mov %bgm_title_language,1
		if $bgm_title_language == "Russian" mov %bgm_title_language,2
		if $bgm_title_language == "Japanese" mov %bgm_title_language,3
		if $bgm_title_language == "Romaji" mov %bgm_title_language,4
	~

	operate_config u_read,$title_skip,"skip_title"
	if $title_skip == "undef" jumpf
		if $title_skip == "all" mov %title_skip,1
		if $title_skip == "force" mov %title_skip,0
	~

	;Original Edited - no more 720p videos - W_CUSTOM
	;operate_config u_read,$video_res,"video_resolution"
	;if $video_res == "undef" jumpf
	;		if $video_res == "720p" mov %video_res,1
	;	if $video_res == "1080p" mov %video_res,0
	;~

	operate_config u_read,$interface_kb_dual,"control_interface"
	if $interface_kb_dual == "undef" jumpf
		if $interface_kb_dual == "kb" mov %interface_kb_dual,0
		if $interface_kb_dual == "pad" mov %interface_kb_dual,1
	~

	operate_config u_read,$enable_cache,"object_caching"
	if $enable_cache == "undef" jumpf
		if $enable_cache == "true" mov %enable_cache,1
		if $enable_cache == "false" mov %enable_cache,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$bgm_vol,"bgm_volume"
	if $bgm_vol != "undef" atoi %bgm_vol,$bgm_vol
	if %bgm_vol < 0 || %bgm_vol > 100 mov %bgm_vol,100

	operate_config u_read,$sfx_vol,"effect_volume"
	if $sfx_vol != "undef" atoi %sfx_vol,$sfx_vol
	if %sfx_vol < 0 || %sfx_vol > 100 mov %sfx_vol,100

	operate_config u_read,$dlg_vol,"voice_volume"
	if $dlg_vol != "undef" atoi %dlg_vol,$dlg_vol
	if %dlg_vol < 0 || %dlg_vol > 100 mov %dlg_vol,100

	operate_config u_read,$rumble_strength,"rumble_strength"
	if $rumble_strength != "undef" atoi %rumble_strength,$rumble_strength
	if %rumble_strength < 0 || %rumble_strength > 100 mov %rumble_strength,100

	operate_config u_read,$textspeed,"text_speed"
	if $textspeed != "undef" atoi %textspeed,$textspeed
	if %textspeed < 0 || %textspeed > 10 mov %textspeed,5 
	text_speed %textspeed

	;Original Edited - from N/B/L/T to Names - W_CUSTOM
	operate_config u_read,$msgwnd_type,"textbox_type"
	if $msgwnd_type == "undef" jumpf
		if $msgwnd_type == "Black" mov %msgwnd_type,0
		if $msgwnd_type == "Butterfly" mov %msgwnd_type,1
		if $msgwnd_type == "Classic" mov %msgwnd_type,2
		if $msgwnd_type == "Transparent" mov %msgwnd_type,3
		if $msgwnd_type == "UmiGold" mov %msgwnd_type,4
	~
	;End Custom

	;Config - ;Dynamic Sprites - Off-Save Custom Config Options - W_CUSTOM
	operate_config u_read,$cfg_chapter_display,"show_chapter_title"
	if $cfg_chapter_display == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_chapter_display == "true" mov %cfg_chapter_display,1
		if $cfg_chapter_display == "false"  mov %cfg_chapter_display,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$cfg_bgm_display,"show_bgm_title"
	if $cfg_bgm_display == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_bgm_display == "true" mov %cfg_bgm_display,1
		if $cfg_bgm_display == "false"  mov %cfg_bgm_display,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$cfg_voice_language,"voice_language"
	if $cfg_voice_language == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_voice_language == "japanese" mov %cfg_voice_language,1
		if $cfg_voice_language == "english"  mov %cfg_voice_language,2
	~

	operate_config u_read,$cfg_rm_sex_content_index,"remove_sexualized_content"
	if $cfg_rm_sex_content_index == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_rm_sex_content_index == "keep_original" mov %cfg_rm_sex_content_index,0
		if $cfg_rm_sex_content_index == "remove_text"   mov %cfg_rm_sex_content_index,1
		if $cfg_rm_sex_content_index == "remove_images" mov %cfg_rm_sex_content_index,2
		if $cfg_rm_sex_content_index == "remove_all"	mov %cfg_rm_sex_content_index,3
	~
	;Initialize Remove Sexualized Content Setting
		if %cfg_rm_sex_content_index = 0 mov %cfg_rm_sex_text_content,0 : mov %cfg_rm_sex_graphic_content,0 : jumpf
		if %cfg_rm_sex_content_index = 1 mov %cfg_rm_sex_text_content,1 : mov %cfg_rm_sex_graphic_content,0 : jumpf
		if %cfg_rm_sex_content_index = 2 mov %cfg_rm_sex_text_content,0 : mov %cfg_rm_sex_graphic_content,1 : jumpf
		if %cfg_rm_sex_content_index = 3 mov %cfg_rm_sex_text_content,1 : mov %cfg_rm_sex_graphic_content,1 : jumpf
	~

	operate_config u_read,$cfg_menu_anim,"enable_menu_animations"
	if $cfg_menu_anim == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_menu_anim == "true" mov %cfg_menu_anim,1
		if $cfg_menu_anim == "false"  mov %cfg_menu_anim,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$cfg_lower_music_on_d,"lower_music_on_d"
	if $cfg_lower_music_on_d == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_lower_music_on_d == "true" mov %cfg_lower_music_on_d,1
		if $cfg_lower_music_on_d == "false"  mov %cfg_lower_music_on_d,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$cfg_book_mode,"book_mode"
	if $cfg_book_mode == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_book_mode == "true" mov %cfg_book_mode,1
		if $cfg_book_mode == "false"  mov %cfg_book_mode,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$cfg_bg_movement,"background_movement"
	if $cfg_bg_movement == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_bg_movement == "true" mov %cfg_bg_movement,1
		if $cfg_bg_movement == "false"  mov %cfg_bg_movement,0
	~

	operate_config u_read,$sprite_folder_name,"sprite_folder_name"
	if $sprite_folder_name == "undef" jumpf
		if $sprite_folder_name == "ps3"  mov %cfg_sprite_type_index,3
		if $sprite_folder_name == "original" mov %cfg_sprite_type_index,1
		if $sprite_folder_name == "pachinko" mov %cfg_sprite_type_index,2
	~
	;Initialize Sprite Type Setting
		if %cfg_sprite_type_index = 1 mov $sprite_folder_name,"original" : jumpf
		if %cfg_sprite_type_index = 2 mov $sprite_folder_name,"pachinko" : jumpf
		if %cfg_sprite_type_index = 3 mov $sprite_folder_name,"ps3" : jumpf
	~

	operate_config u_read,$bg_folder_name,"bg_folder_name"
	if $bg_folder_name == "undef" jumpf
		if $bg_folder_name == "ps3" mov %cfg_bg_type_index,2
		if $bg_folder_name == "original" mov %cfg_bg_type_index,1
	~
	;Initialize Background Type Setting
		if %cfg_bg_type_index = 1 mov $bg_folder_name,"original" : jumpf
		if %cfg_bg_type_index = 2 mov $bg_folder_name,"ps3" : jumpf
	~
	;End Custom

	operate_config u_read,$animated_lips,"lipsync"
	if $animated_lips == "undef" jumpf
		if $animated_lips == "true" mov %animated_lips,1
		if $animated_lips == "false" mov %animated_lips,0
	~

	;Original Edited - this option doesn't exists like this anymore - W_CUSTOM
	;operate_config u_read,$bgm_chapter_display,"display_titles"
	;if $bgm_chapter_display == "true" mov %bgm_chapter_display,1
	;if $bgm_chapter_display == "false" mov %bgm_chapter_display,0
	;End Custom

	operate_config u_read,$op_ed_song_subtitles,"subtitles"
	if $op_ed_song_subtitles == "undef" jumpf
		if $op_ed_song_subtitles == "None" mov %op_ed_song_subtitles,1
		if $op_ed_song_subtitles == "Translation" mov %op_ed_song_subtitles,2
		if $op_ed_song_subtitles == "Romaji" mov %op_ed_song_subtitles,3
		if $op_ed_song_subtitles == "Both" mov %op_ed_song_subtitles,4
	~

    operate_config u_read,$skip_unread,"skip_unread_dialogues"
	if $skip_unread == "undef" jumpf
    	if $skip_unread == "false" mov %skip_unread,1 ;off
    	if $skip_unread == "true" mov %skip_unread,0 ;on
	~
	;Initialize Skip Unread Setting
	    if %skip_unread == 1 skip_unread 0 : jumpf
    	if %skip_unread == 0 skip_unread 1 : jumpf
	~

	operate_config u_read,$hide_textbox,"wheel_down_hides_textbox"
	if $hide_textbox == "undef" jumpf
		if $hide_textbox == "false" mov %hide_textbox,0
		if $hide_textbox == "true" mov %hide_textbox,1
	~

	;Original Edited - added the modification to the value of cfg_steam_conventions - W_CUSTOM
	operate_config u_read,$cfg_steam_conventions,"steam_conventions"
	if $cfg_steam_conventions == "undef" jumpf
		if $cfg_steam_conventions == "true"  mov %cfg_steam_conventions,1
		if $cfg_steam_conventions == "false" mov %cfg_steam_conventions,0
	~
	;Initialize Steam Conventions Setting
		if %cfg_steam_conventions = 0 d_condition 0,1 : d_condition 1,1 : jumpf
		if %cfg_steam_conventions = 1 d_condition 0,0 : d_condition 0,0 : jumpf
	~

	;End Custom

	mov %legacy_op,off ;TODO Convert in an option for displaying only old opening
	operate_config u_read,$legacy_op,"legacy_op"
	if $cfg_steam_conventions == "undef" jumpf
		if $legacy_op == "true" mov %legacy_op,on
		if %legacy_op == on fileexist %legacy_op,"legacy\1080p\op.mp4" ;Original Edited - no more 720p videos - W_CUSTOM
		if %legacy_op == on fileexist %legacy_op,"legacy\1080p\op.mp4"
		if %legacy_op == on fileexist %legacy_op,"legacy\bgm\op.ogg"
	~

	mov %sskip_turbo,1
	operate_config u_read,$sskip_turbo,"sskip_turbo"
		if $sskip_turbo == "false" mov %sskip_turbo,0 : jumpf
	~

return

;================================
;first settings
;================================
*first_setting
csp_rst
if localisation == "en" mov %game_language,0 : mov $Free3,"English"
if localisation == "ru" mov %game_language,1 : mov $Free3,"Русская"
if localisation == "pt" mov %game_language,2 : mov $Free3,"Português"
if localisation == "cn" mov %game_language,3 : mov $Free3,"Chinese Simp."
if localisation == "cht" mov %game_language,4 : mov $Free3,"Chinese Trad."
if localisation == "it" mov %game_language,5 : mov $Free3,"Italiano"
if localisation == "tr" mov %game_language,6 : mov $Free3,"Turkish"

getscriptnum %Free1
for %Free2 = 0 to %Free1-1
	getscriptpath $Free3,%Free2,1
	if localisation == $Free3 mov %Free4,%Free2 ;: debug_var %Free4,"curent language num"
next
getscriptpath $Free3,%Free4,1
mov %Free1,%Free4
dec %Free2

mov %y,300

*first_setting3

gosub *first_settings_game_language
gosub *first_settings_window_size
gosub *first_settings_full_window_auto
gosub *first_settings_interface_kb_dual
gosub *first_settings_ok

if %game_language != 0 jumpf
	lsp 300,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:10:——————}{p:9:{a:c: Initial Game Configuration }{p:10:——————}}",135,%y-100
	lsp 301,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Game language}",135,%y
	lsp 302,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Window size}",135,%y+100
	lsp 303,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Display mode}",135,%y+200
	lsp 304,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Interface}",135,%y+300
~

if %game_language != 1 jumpf
	lsp 300,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:10:—————}{p:9:{a:c: Первоначальная настройка игры }{p:10:—————}}",135,%y-100
	lsp 301,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Локализация игры}",135,%y
	lsp 302,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Размер окна}",135,%y+100
	lsp 303,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Режим отображения}",135,%y+200
	lsp 304,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Управление}",135,%y+300
~

if %game_language != 2 jumpf
	lsp 300,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:10:——————}{p:9:{a:c: Configuração Inicial do Jogo }{p:10:——————}}",135,%y-100
	lsp 301,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Idioma do jogo}",135,%y
	lsp 302,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Tamanho da janela}",135,%y+100
	lsp 303,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Modo de exibição}",135,%y+200
	lsp 304,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Interface}",135,%y+300
~

if %game_language != 3 jumpf
	lsp 300,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:10:——————}{p:9:{a:c: 初始游戏设置 }{p:10:——————}}",135,%y-100
	lsp 301,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:游戏语言}",135,%y
	lsp 302,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:窗口大小}",135,%y+100
	lsp 303,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:显示模式}",135,%y+200
	lsp 304,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:操作界面}",135,%y+300
~

if %game_language != 4 jumpf
	lsp 300,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:10:——————}{p:9:{a:c: 初始遊戲設定 }{p:10:——————}}",135,%y-100
	lsp 301,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:遊戲語言}",135,%y
	lsp 302,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:視窗大小}",135,%y+100
	lsp 303,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:顯示模式}",135,%y+200
	lsp 304,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:操作介面}",135,%y+300
~

if %game_language != 5 jumpf
	lsp 300,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:10:——————}{p:9:{a:c: Configurazione Iniziale di Gioco }{p:10:——————}}",135,%y-100
	lsp 301,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Lingua di Gioco}",135,%y
	lsp 302,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Dimensione Finestra}",135,%y+100
	lsp 303,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Schermata}",135,%y+200
	lsp 304,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Interfaccia}",135,%y+300
~

if %game_language != 6 jumpf
	lsp 300,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:10:——————}{p:9:{a:c: Oyun Ayarları }{p:10:——————}}",135,%y-100
	lsp 301,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Oyun dili}",135,%y
	lsp 302,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Pencere boyutu}",135,%y+100
	lsp 303,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Pencere modu}",135,%y+200
	lsp 304,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Oynanış}",135,%y+300
~


*first_setting2
;Game language button
	spbtn 268,68
	spbtn 269,69
;end

;Display mode button
	spbtn 279,79
	spbtn 280,80
	spbtn 281,81
;end

;Window size button
	spbtn 297,97
	spbtn 298,98
;end

;Interface kb dual button
	spbtn 270,70
	spbtn 271,71
;end

;Interface kb dual button
	spbtn 272,72
;end
~
btnwait %btnRes

if %BtnRes = -1 jumpb
if %BtnRes = -10 jumpb
if %BtnRes = 0 jumpb



;Game language button
	if %BtnRes != 69 jumpf ;left		
		if %Free1 <= 0 getscriptnum %Free1
		dec %Free1
		goto *first_settings_language2		
	~
	if %BtnRes != 68 jumpf ;right
		if %Free1 >= %Free2 mov %Free1,-1
		inc %Free1		
		goto *first_settings_language2
		
		*first_settings_language2	
			getscriptpath $Free4,%Free1
			getscriptpath $Free3,%Free1,1
			operate_config write,$Free4,"game-script"
			operate_config read,$1,"game-script"
			operate_config save 
		goto *first_setting3
	~
;end

;Display mode button
	if %full_window_auto = 1 jumpf	
		if %BtnRes != 79 jumpf 
			operate_config unset,"fullscreen"
			operate_config write,"noval","window"
			operate_config write,"noval","scale"
			operate_config save
			;menu_window
			mov %full_window_auto,1
			gosub *first_settings_full_window_auto
	~
	if %full_window_auto = 2 jumpf
		if %BtnRes != 80 jumpf
			operate_config unset,"window"
			operate_config write,"noval","fullscreen"
			operate_config write,"noval","scale"
			operate_config save
			;menu_full
			mov %full_window_auto,2
			gosub *first_settings_full_window_auto
	~
	if %full_window_auto = 0 jumpf
		if %BtnRes != 81 jumpf
			operate_config unset,"fullscreen"
			operate_config unset,"window"
			operate_config write,"noval","scale"
			operate_config save
			;lsp 373,set_restarted_apply,0,900
			mov %full_window_auto,0
			gosub *first_settings_full_window_auto
	~
;end

;Interface kb dual button
	if %BtnRes != 70 jumpf
	vsp 100,0
	vsp 371,1
	vsp 372,1
	mov %interface_kb_dual,0 : gosub *first_settings_interface_kb_dual
	~
	if %BtnRes != 71 jumpf
	vsp 371,0
	vsp 372,0
	vsp 100,1
	mov %interface_kb_dual,1 : gosub *first_settings_interface_kb_dual
	~
;end

;Window size button
	if %BtnRes != 97 jumpf
		if $window_size = "1280" mov $window_size,"2560" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1366" mov $window_size,"1280" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1440" mov $window_size,"1366" : mov %video_res,1 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1600" mov $window_size,"1440" : mov %video_res,1 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1920" mov $window_size,"1600" : mov %video_res,1 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "2560" mov $window_size,"1920" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		;For Custom
		mov $window_size,"1920" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
	~
	if %BtnRes != 98 jumpf
		if $window_size = "2560" mov $window_size,"1280" : mov %video_res,1 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1920" mov $window_size,"2560" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1600" mov $window_size,"1920" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1440" mov $window_size,"1600" : mov %video_res,1 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1366" mov $window_size,"1440" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		if $window_size = "1280" mov $window_size,"1366" : mov %video_res,1 : goto *first_settings_window_size2
		;For Custom
		mov $window_size,"1920" : mov %video_res,0 : goto *first_settings_window_size2

		*first_settings_window_size2
			operate_config write,$window_size,"window-width"
			operate_config save
			;lsp 373,set_restarted_apply,0,900
			gosub *first_settings_window_size
	~
;end

;Apply
if %BtnRes != 72 jumpf
	goto *first_setting_exit
~
;end

goto *first_setting2
return

*first_settings_game_language
	;debug_string "lang: " + $Free3
	mov %game_language,0 ;if $Free3 == unknown
	if $Free3 == "en" mov $Free3,"English" mov %game_language,0
	if $Free3 == "ru" mov $Free3,"Русская" mov %game_language,1
	if $Free3 == "pt" mov $Free3,"Português" mov %game_language,2
	if $Free3 == "cn" mov $Free3,"Chinese Simp." mov %game_language,3
	if $Free3 == "cht" mov $Free3,"Chinese Trad." mov %game_language,4
	if $Free3 == "it" mov $Free3,"Italiano" mov %game_language,5
	if $Free3 == "tr" mov $Free3,"Turkish" mov %game_language,6
	lsp 273,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}" + $Free3 + "}",1280,%y

	lsp 269,left_arrow,1210,%y
	lsp 268,right_arrow,1640,%y
return

*first_settings_full_window_auto
if %game_language != 1 jumpf
	notif  %full_window_auto = 1 lsp 279,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:Окно}",890,%y+200
	if %full_window_auto = 1 lsp 279,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Окно}",890,%y+200

	if %full_window_auto = 0 lsp 281,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Авто}",1559,%y+200
~

	if %full_window_auto = 1 lsp 279,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:Windowed}",850,%y+200

*first_settings_window_size
	if $window_size = "1280" lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}1280x720}",1280,%y+100 : jumpf
	if $window_size = "1366" lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}1366x768}",1280,%y+100 : jumpf
	if $window_size = "1440" lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}1440х810}",1280,%y+100 : jumpf
	if $window_size = "1600" lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}1600x900}",1280,%y+100 : jumpf
	if $window_size = "1920" lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}1920x1080}",1280,%y+100 : jumpf
	if $window_size = "2560" lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}2560x1440}",1280,%y+100 : jumpf
	if %game_language = 0 lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}Custom}",1280,%y+100
	if %game_language = 1 lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}Пользовательский}",1280,%y+100
	if %game_language = 2 lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}Personalizada}",1280,%y+100
	if %game_language = 3 lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}自定义}",1280,%y+100
	if %game_language = 4 lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}自定義}",1280,%y+100
	if %game_language = 5 lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}Personalizzata}",1280,%y+100
	if %game_language = 6 lsp 299,":s;#FFFFFF`{p:8:{w:350:}{a:c:}{fit}Özel}",1280,%y+100
	~
	lsp 297,left_arrow,1210,%y+112
	lsp 298,right_arrow,1640,%y+112
return

*first_settings_ok
if %game_language != 1 jumpf
	lsp 272,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:Применить}",800,%y+500
~
if %game_language != 0 jumpf
	lsp 272,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:Apply}",800,%y+500
~
if %game_language != 2 jumpf
	lsp 272,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:Aplicar}",800,%y+500
~
if %game_language != 3 jumpf
	lsp 272,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:应用}",800,%y+500
~
if %game_language != 4 jumpf
	lsp 272,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:套用}",800,%y+500
~
if %game_language != 5 jumpf
	lsp 272,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:Applica}",800,%y+500
~
if %game_language != 6 jumpf
	lsp 272,":s;#C7C7C7#FFFFFF`{p:8:Onayla}",800,%y+500
~
return

*first_setting_exit
mov %firstsetting,4
operate_config save
relaunch

;================================
;first settings end
;================================

*verify

backup_disable "backgrounds","caches","fonts","graphics","legacy","sound","sprites","video","chiru.file","default.cfg","en.txt","en.file","ru.txt","ru.file"
gosub *backup_disable_lang

operate_config u_read,$Free5,"verify"

if $Free5 == "undef" jumpf
if $Free5 == "quick" jumpf
if $Free5 == "full" goto *full_verify
if $Free5 == "once" operate_config u_unset,"verify" : operate_config save : goto *full_verify
if $Free5 == "none" return
if $Free5 == ""

~

mov %Free2,0
mov $Free2,""

fileexist %Free1,"backgrounds\ps3\mvip_1cr.png"
if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_backgrounds : gosub *verify_err
fileexist %Free1,"graphics\system\fade\1920x1080.png"
if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_graphics : gosub *verify_err
fileexist %Free1,"sound\bgm\bgm_final.ogg"
;Variable Spec Sprites Folder - W_CUSTOM - ??? what have i changed here? TODO
if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_sound : gosub *verify_err
fileexist %Free1,"sprites\ps3\bea\1\bea_a11_akuwarai1.png"
;End Custom
if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_sprites : gosub *verify_err
fileexist %Free1,"video\1080p\no46.mp4" ;Original Edited - no more 720p videos - W_CUSTOM
if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_video : gosub *verify_err

fileexist %Free1,"graphics\localized\shared\project_logo.png"
if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"video\sub\both_eng.ass"
	if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"video\sub\58_both_eng.ass"
	if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"sound\bgm\Treasure.png"
	if %Free1==0 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"sound\voice\jp\27\50700008.ogg",%Free2
	if %Free1==0 || %Free2!=36912 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"sound\se\umise_072.ogg",%Free2
	if %Free1==0 || %Free2!=60852 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"sound\bgm\umib_063.ogg",%Free2
	if %Free1==0 || %Free2!=14990832 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"sound\bgm\op.ogg",%Free2
	if %Free1==0 || %Free2!=3171336 mov $Free1,verify_updates : gosub *verify_err : jumpf
	fileexist %Free1,"sound\bgm\op.ogg",%Free2

	if releasedate + 15552000 > %Free1 return

	if %r_for_title != 1 jumpf ;In special text i use -1

		if %UMINEKOEND >= 80 mov %temp_var2,93+53*0+(53/2)
		if %UMINEKOEND >= 90 mov %temp_var2,93+53*0
		;debug_var %temp_var2
		if %UMINEKOEND >= 30 lsp gen_txt_2,char_change_ep_btn,%temp_var2,898 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"char_ep_btn",%temp_var2,902,"1" : if %scenario_Number = 1 lsp gen_txt_2,char_change_ep_btn_clicked,%temp_var2,898 : write_special_text gen_txt_2,"char_ep_btn",%temp_var2,902,"1","disabled"

		if %UMINEKOEND >= 30 lsp gen_txt_3,char_change_ep_btn,%temp_var2,898 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"char_ep_btn",%temp_var2,902,"2" : if %scenario_Number = 2 lsp gen_txt_3,char_change_ep_btn_clicked,%temp_var2,898 : write_special_text gen_txt_3,"char_ep_btn",%temp_var2,902,"2","disabled"

	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *rmenu_main_eps_8
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *rmenu_main_eps_8_2
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 2 goto *rmenu_main_eps_8_3

	error "We should never return from here"

;=====================
*rmenu_main_eps
;==========EP1===========
*rmenu_main_eps_1
	;during the Ura of ep1 the only sheet available is that of witches
	if %r_u_tea_flg = 0 if %r_for_title != 1 lsp r_hana_lsp,char_tree_1f,0,0 
	if %r_u_tea_flg = 0 if %r_for_title == 1 lsp r_hana_lsp,char_tree_1f,0,0,0 
	if %r_u_tea_flg = 1 _csp r_hana_lsp

	gosub *bt_ep1_def

	mov %load_for_title,0
	mov ?r[1][bea][condition],-1
	mov ?r[1][ber][condition],-1

	for %tmp = 1 to char_max
		if ?r[1][%tmp][condition] >= ?r[1][%tmp][condition_end] mov ?r[1][%tmp][condition],?r[1][%tmp][condition_end]
	next

	;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - ep1 Standard btn behavior

	;debug_var %r_for_title
	;debug_var %r_side
	;debug_var %r_u_tea_flg
	;debug_var %r_ber_flg 
	;debug_var %r_tea_bea

	if %r_for_title = 1 && %r_side = 0 gosub *r_for_title_ep1
	if %r_for_title = 1 && %r_side = 1 gosub *r_u_tea_flg_ep1
	if %r_u_tea_flg = 1 gosub *r_u_tea_flg_ep1
	if %r_ber_flg = 1 gosub *r_ber_flg_ep1
	if %r_tea_bea = 1 gosub *r_tea_bea_flg_ep1

	gosub *rmenu_display_new


goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_new

;==========EP2===========
*rmenu_main_eps_2
	;If the back of the tea party episode 2, skip processing *rmenu_main_ep2_2.
	notif %r_for_title = 1 if %play_scene >= 2010 goto *rmenu_main_eps_2_2

	;lsp line menu
	mov $r_cha_back,char_tree_1f
	;lsp r_hana_lsp,r_hana,1148,180

	mov %load_for_title,0
	mov %r_side,0
	mov %r_u_tea_flg,0

	gosub *bt_ep2_def
	
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep2
		mov ?r[2][%tmp][condition],1
	next
	mov ?r[2][bea][condition],-1
	mov ?r[2][ber][condition],-1
	mov ?r[2][lam][condition],-1

	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep2
		mov ?r[2][%tmp][r_ishou],1
	next

	if %r_display_cha == 0 mov %r_display_cha,kin

	gosub *rmenu_play_scene_ep2

	;lsp line menu
	lsp r_hana_lsp,$r_cha_back,0,0,0
	
	if ?r[2][%r_display_cha][condition]= -1 mov %r_display_cha,0
	
	if %r_for_title = 1 gosub *r_for_title_0_ep2

	gosub *rmenu_display_new
goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_new

;==========EP2_2===========
*rmenu_main_eps_2_2
	;lsp line menu
	if %r_u_tea_flg = 0 lsp r_hana_lsp,char_tree_2m,0,0,0
	if %r_u_tea_flg = 1 _csp r_hana_lsp
	
	;lsp r_hana_lsp,r_hana_witch,1148,180
	
	gosub *bt_ep2_2_def

	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep2 : mov ?r[2][%tmp][condition],-1 : next
		
	mov %load_for_title,0
	mov %r_side,1
	;mov %r_u_tea_flg,0

	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep2_2
		mov ?r[2][%tmp][condition],1
	next

	for %tmp = 1 to char_max_ep2_2
		mov ?r[2][%tmp][r_ishou],1
	next

	if %r_display_cha_ma == 0 mov %r_display_cha_ma,ma_bea

	if ?r[2][%r_display_cha][condition]= -1 mov %r_display_cha,0

	if %r_for_title = 1 gosub *r_for_title_0_ep2_2

	gosub *rmenu_play_scene_ep2_2
	gosub *rmenu_display_new
goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_new

;==========EP3===========

	next

	next

;=====================
*r_for_title_ep1
;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Customized Positions
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max
		mov ?r[1][%tmp][condition],1
	next
	
	;Beatrice in the family tree
	mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_x],200-100-0+4 : mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_y],278
	
	mov %r_display_cha,but
return
;=====================
*r_u_tea_flg_ep1
;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Customized Positions
	for %tmp = 1 to char_max
		mov ?r[1][%tmp][condition],-1 ;De-load family images
	next
	
	;State set
	mov ?r[1][bea][condition],1

	;Beatrice initially unlocked in the 1st Ura
	mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_x],460-160-24 : mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_y],366 ;position Ura_tea_chars
return
;=====================
*r_ber_flg_ep1
;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Customized Positions
	;Moving Bea to place Bern 1st Ura
	mov ?r[1][ber][condition],1
	mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_x],330-130-12+2+28 : mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_y],366 ;position Ura_tea_chars
	mov ?r[1][ber][itiran_x],590-190-36-2-28 : mov ?r[1][ber][itiran_y],366 ;position Ura_tea_chars
return
;=====================
*r_tea_bea_flg_ep1
	mov ?r[1][bea][condition],1 : mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_x],200-100-0+4 : mov ?r[1][bea][itiran_y],278 ;position tea_chars
return
;=====================
*r_for_title_ep2
	notif %r_for_title = 1 jumpf
	if %r_display > 0 jumpf	
		if %r_display_cha = jes && ?r[2][jes][condition] = 1 lsp r_change_lsp,char_outfit_btn,369,743
		if %r_display_cha = geo && ?r[2][geo][condition] = 1 lsp r_change_lsp,char_outfit_btn,369,743
		if %r_display_cha = sha && ?r[2][sha][condition] = 1 lsp r_change_lsp,char_outfit_btn,369,743

	~

*rmenu_display_new
	;textoff
	;btndef ""

	;if %r_side_change = 3 lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : print 1

	if %scenario_Number = 1 gosub *rmenu_sai_display_n_ep1 ;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Commented : align_buttons_l r_people_lsp,r_witches_lsp,r_exec_lsp,r_resu_lsp,r_change_lsp
	if %scenario_Number = 2 && %r_side = 0 gosub *rmenu_sai_display_n_ep2 ;: align_buttons_l r_people_lsp,r_witches_lsp,r_exec_lsp,r_resu_lsp,r_change_lsp

	if %scenario_Number = 3 && %r_side = 0 gosub *rmenu_sai_display_n_ep3 ;: align_buttons_l r_people_lsp,r_witches_lsp,r_exec_lsp,r_resu_lsp,r_change_lsp

	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 0 gosub *rmenu_sai_n_display_ep4 ;: align_buttons_l r_people_lsp,r_witches_lsp,r_ange_lsp,r_exec_lsp,r_resu_lsp,r_change_lsp
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 1 gosub *rmenu_sai_n_display_ep4_2 ;: align_buttons_l r_people_lsp,r_witches_lsp,r_ange_lsp,r_exec_lsp,r_resu_lsp,r_change_lsp
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 2 gosub *rmenu_sai_n_display_ep4_3 ;: align_buttons_l r_people_lsp,r_witches_lsp,r_ange_lsp,r_change_lsp

	;From the display format, Tsukaiwakeru tips, lists or character.
	if %r_display = 0 gosub *r_cha_button_new

	;Automatically matching the selected character at the end, the tips
	if %r_display = 0 gosub *r_cha_display

	if %r_side_change = 1 print 10,500 : mov %r_side_change,0 : return
	if %r_side_change = 2 print 99,3000,"breakup.dll/urB" : mov %r_side_change,0 : return
	lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : print 10,500 : _csp 2 : print 10,100 ; menu entrance

return

*rmenu_sai_display_n_ep1
	_csp r_people_lsp
	_csp r_witches_lsp
	_csp r_ange_lsp
	_csp r_blog_lsp
;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - In-Menu Action and Misc Buttons
	;If the title screen, put a live button
	notif %r_for_title = 1 jumpf
		;Switching condition of the character has been selected by
		if %r_u_tea_flg = 1 lsp r_people_lsp,char_previous_btn,70,660 : write_special_text gen_txt_15,"char_page_previous",114,657,char_prev_text,"enabled"
		if %r_u_tea_flg = 0 lsp r_people_lsp,char_previous_btn_clicked,70,660 : write_special_text gen_txt_15,"char_page_previous",114,657,char_prev_text,"disabled"
		if %r_u_tea_flg = 0 lsp r_witches_lsp,char_next_btn,316,660 : write_special_text gen_txt_16,"char_page_next",317,657,char_next_text,"enabled"
		if %r_u_tea_flg = 1 lsp r_witches_lsp,char_next_btn_clicked,316,660 : write_special_text gen_txt_16,"char_page_next",317,657,char_next_text,"disabled"
		lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"
		lsp r_resu_lsp,char_action_btn,120,807 : write_special_text gen_txt_18,"char_action",124,806,char_resurrect_label,"disabled"
		lsp r_blog_lsp,char_outfit_btn_disabled,369,743
	~
return
	
*rmenu_sai_display_n_ep2
	_csp r_people_lsp
	_csp r_witches_lsp
	_csp r_ange_lsp
	_csp r_exec_lsp
	_csp r_resu_lsp
	_csp r_blog_lsp
	notif %r_for_title = 1 jumpf
	notif %r_display = 0 jumpf

		lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"

	~

		mov %tmp10,%tmp1 : sub %tmp10,128
		lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"

		lsp r_witches_lsp,char_next_btn,316,660 : write_special_text gen_txt_16,"char_page_next",317,657,char_next_text,"enabled"
	~

		_csp r_witches_lsp
		_csp gen_txt_15 : _csp gen_txt_16
	~

		_csp r_people_lsp
		_csp r_witches_lsp
		_csp gen_txt_15 : _csp gen_txt_16
	~

	notif %r_for_title = 1 jumpf
		lsp r_blog_lsp,char_outfit_btn_disabled,369,743
		lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"
		lsp r_resu_lsp,char_action_btn,120,807 : write_special_text gen_txt_18,"char_action",124,806,char_resurrect_label,"disabled"
	~

		lsp r_exec_lsp,char_action_btn,120,743 : write_special_text gen_txt_17,"char_action",124,742,char_execute_label,"disabled"

	~

	if %scenario_Number = 7 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep5_2_ep8_2

	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep5_ep8
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep5_2_ep8_2
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 2 goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep5_2_ep8_2
	
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep1
		mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max
		
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = kin_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[1][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep2
		mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep2
		
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = kin_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[2][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep2_2
		mov %tmp,ma_bea_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep2_2
		
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = ma_bea_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[2][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep3
		mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep3
		
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = kin_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[3][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep3_2
		mov %tmp,ma_bea_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep3_2
		
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = ma_bea_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[3][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep4
		mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep4
		
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = kin_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[4][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep4_2
		mov %tmp,ma4_lam_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep4_2
	
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = ma4_lam_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[4][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep4_3
		mov %tmp,enj_eva_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep4_3
	
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = enj_eva_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[4][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep5_ep8
		if %scenario_Number = 5	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep5
		if %scenario_Number = 6	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep6
		if %scenario_Number = 7	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep6
		if %scenario_Number = 8	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep6
		;mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep5
	
		mov %tmp3,1
		for %tmp2 = kin_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%tmp2
			inc %tmp3
		next
		
		if ?r[%scenario_Number][eri][condition] >= 1 spbtn eri_btn_lsp,eri_btn_lsp
		if ?r[%scenario_Number][rio][condition] >= 1 spbtn rio_btn_lsp,rio_btn_lsp
		if ?r[%scenario_Number][EN2][condition] >= 1 spbtn EN2_btn_lsp,EN2_btn_lsp
		if ?r[%scenario_Number][si][condition] >= 1 spbtn si_btn_lsp,si_btn_lsp
		if ?r[%scenario_Number][bea][condition] >= 1 spbtn bea_btn_lsp,bea_btn_lsp
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new
	
	*rmenu_button_reconfigure_ep5_2_ep8_2
		mov %tmp,ma5_lam_btn_lsp : add %tmp,char_max_ep5_2
		
		mov %tmp3,1
		mov %Free1,ma5_lam
		for %tmp2 = ma5_lam_btn_lsp to %tmp
			if ?r[%scenario_Number][%tmp3][condition] >= 1 spbtn %tmp2,%free1
			inc %tmp3 : inc %free1
		next
	goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_new

*rmenu_custom_btlp_new

	;stopwatch "rmenu_custom_btlp_new"
	btnwait2 %BtnRes

	;убираем потерю ракурса от персонажа при нажатии в любое пустое место. Если нужно, то добавляем перед goto строчку mov %r_display_cha,0
	;Rimuoviamo la perdita dell'angolo di visuale del personaggio quando si preme in qualsiasi punto vuoto. Se necessario, aggiungiamo prima della riga goto il movimento %r_display_cha,0
	if %BtnRes = 0 goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_new
	if %BtnRes = r_exit_lsp goto *rmenu_go_out
	if %BtnRes = -1 goto *rmenu_go_out
	if %BtnRes = -10 goto *rmenu_go_out
	if %BtnRes=99 spt scroll_y,%r_display_arrow,-70,166,1 : sptwait scroll_y,%r_display_arrow	;button up
	if %BtnRes=98 spt scroll_y,%r_display_arrow,70,166,1 : sptwait scroll_y,%r_display_arrow	;button down

	;W_CUSTOM - ;Char menu - Ep change btns
	mov %char_switching_ep,0 ;lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : print 22 : _csp 97,r_used_lsp : _csp 2
	;if %scenario_Number != 1 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_2 lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : seplay 9,1010,100 : print 10,500 : mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,1 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	;if %scenario_Number != 2 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_3 lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : seplay 9,1010,100 : print 10,500 : mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,2 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title

	;if %scenario_Number != 6 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_7 lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : seplay 9,1010,100 : print 10,500 : mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,6 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	;if %scenario_Number != 7 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_8 lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : seplay 9,1010,100 : print 10,500 : mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,7 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	;if %scenario_Number != 8 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_9 lsp 2,":c;graphics\colour\black.png",0,0 : seplay 9,1010,100 : print 10,500 : mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,8 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %scenario_Number != 1 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_2 mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,1 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %scenario_Number != 2 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_3 mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,2 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %scenario_Number != 3 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_4 mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,3 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %scenario_Number != 4 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_5 mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,4 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %scenario_Number != 5 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_6 mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,5 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title
	if %scenario_Number != 6 if %BtnRes=gen_txt_7 mov %char_save_scenario_Num,%scenario_Number : mov %scenario_Number,6 : mov %char_switching_ep,1 : mov %char_selector_ep_change,1 : mov %r_for_title,1 : mov %r_ber_flg,0 : btndef "" : gosub *rmenu_main_new : mov %title_skip,1 : goto *b_title

	;rondo
	if %scenario_Number = 1 goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_ep1
	if %scenario_Number = 2 && %r_side = 0 goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_ep2

	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *rmenu_custom_btlp_ep8_2

		gosub *btlp_ep2
		;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - Char Btns - moved all char_state befor char_display - for execute btn appearence behavior
		;If the character icon is pressed, you jump to each character

		if %BtnRes = rud_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = rud : mov %r_display_cha,rud : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1   
		if %BtnRes = kir_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = kir : mov %r_display_cha,kir : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1

		if %BtnRes = ros_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = ros : mov %r_display_cha,ros : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1 
		if %BtnRes = mar_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = mar : mov %r_display_cha,mar : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1 
		if %BtnRes = nan_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = nan : mov %r_display_cha,nan : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1

		if %BtnRes = kum_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = kum : mov %r_display_cha,kum : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1

		if %BtnRes = sha_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = sha : mov %r_display_cha,sha : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1  
		if %BtnRes = kan_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = kan : mov %r_display_cha,kan : mov %mchar_state,0  	 : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1
		if %BtnRes = bea_btn_lsp notif %r_display_cha = bea : mov %r_display_cha,bea : mov %mchar_state,0    : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1

	goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_end

		gosub *btlp_ep2

		gosub *btlp_ep2
		if %BtnRes = r_witches_lsp || %BtnRes = r_people_lsp || %BtnRes = r_ange_lsp goto *rmenu_main_new_reload

		if %BtnRes = ma5_goa notif %r_display_cha_ma = ma5_goa : mov %r_display_cha_ma,ma5_goa : gosub *r_cha_display : seplay 9,1001,100 : print 1 : mov %mchar_state,2
	goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_end
		
*rmenu_button_reconfigure_end
	
	goto *rmenu_button_reconfigure_new


*rmenu_go_out
	border_pad_pop
	mov %char_is_selected,0 ;W_CUSTOM ;Char Menu - needed for drawer animation
	mov %char_switching_ep,0
	mov %char_moving_side,1
	if %r_for_title == 1 mov %scenario_Number,%char_save_scenario_Num
	gosub *menu_rain_unpause
	goto *r_exit
return

;=====================
*r_cha_button_new
	if %scenario_Number = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep1
	if %scenario_Number = 2 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_button_ep2
	if %scenario_Number = 2 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep2_2
	if %scenario_Number = 3 && %r_side = 0 goto *r_cha_button_ep3
	if %scenario_Number = 3 && %r_side = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep3_2
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *r_cha_button_ep4
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep4_2
	if %scenario_Number = 4 && %r_display_side = 2 goto *r_cha_button_ep4_3
	if %scenario_Number = 5 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *r_cha_button_ep5
	if %scenario_Number = 5 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep5_2
	if %scenario_Number = 6 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *r_cha_button_ep5
	if %scenario_Number = 6 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep5_2
	if %scenario_Number = 6 && %r_display_side = 2 goto *r_cha_button_ep6_3
	if %scenario_Number = 7 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *r_cha_button_ep5
	if %scenario_Number = 7 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep5_2
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 0 goto *r_cha_button_ep5
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 1 goto *r_cha_button_ep5_2
	if %scenario_Number = 8 && %r_display_side = 2 goto *r_cha_button_ep8_3
	
goto *r_cha_button_end

;----EP1----
*r_cha_button_ep1

;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - ep1 LSP
;W_CUSTOM - ;Char Menu - changed all lsp to lsp with %char_hider opacity
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG <= 1 mov %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG,0

	;(Changing the display by a condition) of the character display icon
	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp
	for %tmp2 = 1 to char_max
		;aspt alpha,%tmp,%char_hider
		if ?r[1][%tmp2][condition] = -1 jumpf ;Condition is completely hidden -1
			;needed for "black ?" when now char is known
			if ?r[1][%tmp2][condition] = 0 lsp %tmp,$?r[1][%tmp2][?r[1][%tmp2][condition]],?r[1][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[1][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider jumpf
			;don't know why with lsph works, but let's leave this like this
			lsp %tmp,$?r[1][%tmp2][?r[1][%tmp2][condition]],?r[1][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[1][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
			;aspt alpha,%tmp,255,300
		~
		inc %tmp
	next

	;If no flag is set, do not show the character
	if %r_for_title = 0 && %r_u_tea_flg = 0 if %r_tea_bea = 0 _csp bea_btn_lsp : _csp ber_btn_lsp
	if %r_u_tea_flg = 0 _csp ber_btn_lsp

goto *r_cha_button_end
;----EP2----
*r_cha_button_ep2
	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG <= 2 mov %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG,0

	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp
	for %tmp2 = 1 to char_max_ep2
		if ?r[2][%tmp2][condition] = -1 jumpf
			lsp %tmp,$?r[2][%tmp2][?r[2][%tmp2][condition]],?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
			
			if %tmp2 = sha && ?r[2][%tmp2][condition] = 1 && ?r[2][%tmp2][r_ishou] = 2 lsp sha_btn_lsp,":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_sha1.png",?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
			if %tmp2 = geo && ?r[2][%tmp2][condition] = 1 && ?r[2][%tmp2][r_ishou] = 2 lsp geo_btn_lsp,":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_geo1.png",?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
			if %tmp2 = kan && ?r[2][%tmp2][condition] = 1 && ?r[2][%tmp2][r_ishou] = 2 lsp kan_btn_lsp,":c/1,0,3;graphics\portraits\"+$sprite_folder_name+"\chars_kan1.png",?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
		~
		inc %tmp
	next

goto *r_cha_button_end
;----EP2_2----
*r_cha_button_ep2_2

	mov %tmp,ma_bea_btn_lsp
	for %tmp2 = 1 to char_max_ep2_2
		if ?r[2][%tmp2][condition] = -1 jumpf
			lsp %tmp,$?r[2][%tmp2][?r[2][%tmp2][condition]],?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[2][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
		~
		inc %tmp
	next

goto *r_cha_button_end
;----EP3----
*r_cha_button_ep3

	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG <= 3 mov %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG,0

	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp
	for %tmp2 = 1 to char_max_ep3
		if ?r[3][%tmp2][condition] = -1 jumpf
			lsp %tmp,$?r[3][%tmp2][?r[3][%tmp2][condition]],?r[3][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[3][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
		~
		inc %tmp
	next

goto *r_cha_button_end
;----EP3_2----
*r_cha_button_ep3_2

	mov %tmp,ma_bea_btn_lsp
	for %tmp2 = 1 to char_max_ep3_2
		if ?r[3][%tmp2][condition] = -1 jumpf
			lsp %tmp,$?r[3][%tmp2][?r[3][%tmp2][condition]],?r[3][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[3][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider

			if %tmp2 = ma3_ev2 && ?r[3][%tmp2][condition] = 1 && ?r[3][%tmp2][r_ishou] = 2 lsp ma3_ev2_btn_lsp,":c/2,0,3;bmp\r_click\cha_btn\ep3_2\ev2_l2.bmp",?r[3][%tmp2][itiran_x],?r[3][%tmp2][itiran_y],%char_hider
		~
		inc %tmp
	next

goto *r_cha_button_end
;----EP4----

	if %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG <= 4 mov %UMINEKOEND_TIPS_CHA_FLG,0

	mov %tmp,kin_btn_lsp
	for %tmp2 = 1 to char_max_ep4
		if ?r[4][%tmp2][condition] = -1 jumpf

		~
		inc %tmp
	next

goto *r_cha_button_end
;----EP4_2----

		~

;----EP4_3----
